Title: Sunny Ha Giang Loop
Description: Die Tour hat meine Erwartungen übertroffen! Wir waren in einer Gruppe zu viert unterwegs (was sehr angenehm war, weil nicht zu groß) mit unserem Guide Monkey, der hervorragend Englisch sprach, extrem witzig und hilfsbereit war. Er hat uns auch auf kleinere Wege abseits der Hauptstraße geführt, wo wir komplett alleine eindrucksvolle Aussichten genießen konnten. Die Driver waren auch sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend, wir haben uns immer gut aufgehoben gefühlt und tolle Abende verbracht. Die Unterkünfte, das Essen und die Ausrüstung waren perfekt. Sunny hat uns auch die Rückfahrt nach Hanoi organisiert.
Rank_of_province: Số 4 trên 49 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Giang

Title: Deep People Freediving School

За два дня нашел все ответы на свои вопросы на теоретическом курсе, а затем выполнил 1 уровень в открытом море! Ни с чем несравнимые ощущения, рекомендую всем! Я в восторге от того, что может тело человека при грамотном подходе.
Rank_of_province: Số 24 trên 142 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Nha Trang

Title: Vietnam Insider Travel
Description: Khởi đầu tour thăm vịnh Lan Hạ bằng một buổi sáng mưa và lạnh. Suýt chút nữa thì huỷ tour nhưng không huỷ được nên đành phải đi. Nhưng việc tưởng như không may này lại rất ổn. Mưa gió lạnh suốt buổi sáng nhưng đến chỗ chèo kayak thì tự nhiên lại tạnh ráo và đẹp trời. Quá sức may mắn, sau đó thì thuyền đưa về Ba Trái Đào ăn trưa. Ăn luôn trên thuyền, bác lái tàu rất nhiệt tình và nấu rất vừa miệng. No nê rồi anh em nhày xuống mấy bãi quanh đó bơi và chơi, đã đời, vắng hoang sơ và tuyệt đẹp. Sau đó đoạn đi về được bác lái tàu kể cho bao chuyện về Cát Bà, thời tiết đẹp ngắm Vịnh đẹp miễn chê. Thấy quyết định thuê tender riêng để đi là chuẩn xác. Còn nhiều chỗ hay ho nhưng để dành lần sau. Thank you for all!

Description: Go Bamboo has diversified into car tours with the same management. I used Thai's car tours in Hanoi for a city tour. One of the attractions was the Hanoi train track in the Old Quarter.
Rank_of_province: Số 152 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Ancient Orient Journeys
Description:
We just returned from a once-in-a-lifetime trip arranged by Vinh of Ancient Orient Journeys. We went to Vietnam and Cambodia with 7 people in our family for a 2-week trip. The youngest traveler was age 6 and the oldest was age 63. Vinh did an incredible job incorporating activities that appealed to all ages in the group while making us feel like adventurers. We also felt like we learned a lot about the local culture from our guides, the sites we visited, and the activities. All of the hotels were 5-star and some literally made our jaw drop when we saw our rooms. The food was amazing, and our guides did a nice job of addressing food allergies and preferences.
Vinh also checked in with us throughout the trip. We were super impressed when he learned we were celebrating my parent's 40th anniversary and was able to arrange a nice surprise at the hotel the same day.
Rank_of_province: Số 52 trên 425 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Chúng tôi đã đi qua đèo Hải Vân trên một chiếc xe thật tuyệt, thậm chí còn mang túi xách của tôi trả tại khách sạn và lấy xe về. Những nhân viên ở đó (Ngộ và Sơn) rất thân thiện và vui tính, tôi đề nghị giữ xe thêm một ngày để đi tham quan Đà Nẵng, các bạn ấy đã rất nhiệt tình hướng dẫn đường đi cho tôi và những nơi tôi có thể dừng chân tham quan. Cám ơn các bạn đã cho chúng tôi những trải nghiệm tuyệt vời. Hẹn gặp lại các bạn vào lần sau khi chúng tôi trờ lại Đà Nẵng.

Title: Experience Hoi An: Dong Family Cooking and Tours
Description:
Fantastic morning with Dong and his lovely wife, before cooking in their home with Dong’s mother’s guidance. First we cycled to markets for ingredients and refreshments, and then to a herb plot.
Great to have the chance understand the names and growth habits of the herbs that enliven Hoi An cuisine, and we ‘worked’ a plot briefly. It was more than a cooking (and delicious eating) session, but a wonderful insight into local life. Dong’s English is good, and he’s enthusiastic and generous about sharing food, culture and family.
Pleased to recommend this half day experience.

Title: Con Dao Dive Center
Description:
Chuyến đi tuyệt vời.
Tôi đã đặt trip lặn vào ngày 24-29/5. Nhờ center báo lại là thời gian đó có bão nên tôi đã chuyển sang 21-26/5 và thời tiết thật tuyệt.
Phong và Xuân,Sim đã hỗ trợ tôi rất nhiều để có chuyến đi không quên này.
Giá lặn cao , nhưng hoàn toàn xứng đáng. Có những ngày Phong đưa tôi ra biển với 1 mình tôi là khách hàng trên cano.San hô và hệ sinh vật biển phong phú top 1 việt nam.
Xuân đã giúp tôi có trải nghiệm xem và bảo tồn rùa đẻ trên bãi biển cùng kiểm lâm hòn Bảy Cạnh.
Nếu để chọn một nơi để quay lại thì chỉ có 1 cái tên : Côn Đảo.

Title: Red Dragon Junk
Description: Une très belle croisière dans un bateau intimiste (5 cabines) tout confort. Le bateau bien arrimé fait que l’on passe une excellente nuit. Les repas sont servis sur le pont, les repas sont de très bonne qualité et le service est soigné. Mention spéciale à T small, un guide anglophone très sympa et à l’équipe restauration. La virée en kayak au milieu des roches et la visite en barque d’un village flottant de pêcheurs complètent bien ce séjour dans une baie à l’écart d’Halong. Je recommande.

Title: Vietnam Eco-Tours
Description:
Cela a été notre plus belle expérience au Vietnam! Quelqu'un m'a donné le contact de Luc nous avons fait confiance et cela a été juste une expérience magique. Nous avons pu aller à la rencontre de ces magnifiques Douc à pattes rousses, très facile à voir quand on est bien accompagné. Nous avons eu la chance de les voir d'assez près, ils ont même traversé leur pont de singe juste au dessus de nos têtes.
J'aurais pu passer la journée à les observer.
Luc et Nat ont été très agréables et très intéressants, ils aiment les animaux et ça fait plaisir de rencontrer des personnes comme ça.
Thank you so much, all the best to you.

Pour les francophones, c'est LE centre de plongée à faire à Nha Trang.

Title: Mekong River Cruise
Description: This cruise is an eye opener to how some Vietnamese are living outside of the capital. Hard yakka, in small shops selling rice based products (snake rice wine) or working on local fruit plantations where they are earning 10 cents a kilo for their hard labour. You may visit women expertly weaving hammocks from dried banana tree roots, amazing. You’ll have a delicious fish lunch served by shy women and young exquisite lads. It’s all done with a happy smile. We couldn’t have felt more welcomed. One not so pleasant sight is the endless spread of rubbish left on the roads and floating in the Mekong….
Rank_of_province: Số 31 trên 155 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: JeepVN
Description:
Или путешествие по следам Индиана Джонса – в поисках ярких впечатлений индивидуальный джип-тур С Константином

Людиииии!!!Все кто находиться или будет в Нячагне- просто воспользуйтесь волшебным шансом почувствовать атмосферу и запахи настоящих чудес первозданной природы Вьетнама и прикоснуться к ним, не из застекленного автобуса, а прям сливаясь с ней! Такой восторг получили и от всей поездки и от маршрутов предложенных #Джиптур! Благодарим Константина за его очень продуманные тропы, новые и прекрасные своей оригинальностью! За его широчайший кругозор и желанием подарить своим клиентам весь мир и самобытность этой разнообразной страны-во всей многогранности! Научить видеть прекрасное в мелочах и заново чувствовать запах жизни! Это не просто слова! Господа! Это чуткий подход к каждому клиенту через внимательный подход, чувствование запроса человека и его физические возможности. Можно просто обозначить Константину все свои желания- и он как волшебник «великий Гудвин» их осуществляет! И Ты с первых же минут уже не клиент- ты уже друг! Это прекрасно… это приятно… и это дарит кучу эмоций и счастье! Мы решили в поездке с #Джиптур отпраздновать свой день рождения и благодаря Константину получили ну очеееень шикарный праздник!!! Советуем всем !!!

P.S. Ездили на «Пикник в джунглях», но это было гораздо более чем «пикник» 😍😍😍
Rank_of_province: Số 29 trên 196 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Nha Trang

Title: Number 1 Travel Vietnam
Description: Chúng tôi đã có 1 chuyến đi tuyệt vời vs công ty. Xin cảm ơn công ty rất nhiều!!! Nhất định chúng tôi sẽ quay trở lại đặt thêm dịch vụ

Title: Vietnam Tour Co.,Ltd
Description: I had travelled to Vietnam with my family in July 2023. I had contacted Vietnam Tours and Travels before my trip to arrange tours in Vietnam and Miss Minh helped me. She was very professional, extremely helpful and punctual. She sent me different itineraries that were budget friendly and also sorted out our visas to Vietnam. Their tours in Da Nang were really nice and well organised. The tour guides picked us up from the hotel and they were very good and knowledgeable. We had an awesome experience. Miss Minh coordinated with us very well and took note of all our details. I strongly recommend going through them. Thank you Miss Minh and Vietnam Tour Company.
Rank_of_province: Số 23 trên 525 Mua sắm ở Hà Nội

Title: The Savage Dragon's Island Adventures
Description: Amazing experience! I was able to do spearfishing for the first time & fell in love with it. We were alone on an island and cooked what we caught (& some extra seafood). You can't beat that dinner at sunset. Not a "tourist tour" at all & I highly recommend getting in touch with Savage!
Rank_of_province: Số 15 trên 104 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Đảo Phú Quốc

Title: Green Hat Holiday

Rank_of_province: Số 2 trên 14 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Đảo Phú Quốc

Title: Cozy Boutique Cruise
Description: Ha sido una experiencia muy agradable. Empezando por el entorno y las increíbles vistas que te dejan impresionado y siguiendo por el servicio que es muy bueno en todo momento, comida excelente y el barco muy bonito. Muy recomendable.
Rank_of_province: Số 23 trên 75 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Cát Bà

Title: Little Hue Travel
Description: Chúng tôi đã có một chuyến đi thật tuyệt vời cùng Little Hue Travel. Công ty đã giúp mọi người trong đoàn có thể trải nghiệm dịch vụ một cách hoàn hảo, thái độ phục vụ chuyên nghiệp, tận tình. Riêng khâu chăm sóc khách trong và sau chuyến đi của họ làm tôi rất bất ngờ. Họ quan tâm đên chúng tôi trong từng dịch vụ nhỏ nhất có trong tour. Trước chuyến đi, có nhiều công ty chào mời, nhưng thông qua một số gia đình, cơ quan đã trải nghiệm dịch vụ của Little Hue trước đó giới thiệu, thì tôi hoàn toàn yên tâm. Thật may mắn là tôi đã có một sự lựa chọn đúng đắn. Rất cám ơn công ty, tôi sẽ quay lại sử dụng dịch vụ của công ty trong những chuyến tham quan sau. Chắc chắn là vậy.
Rank_of_province: Số 7 trên 39 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Huế

Title: Explore My Hoi An
Description: Of all the tours we have done in Vietnam, this was by far, my favourite. Because this is Sinh's own business, he makes you feel very welcome and tailors the trip to suit your interests and fitness level. We loved the scenery, the local people and boat ride. The market garden was beautiful and a special moment. But, THEN you arrive at Sinh's home and his beautiful wife Jessica just shines. Oh my goodness!!!! The fun we had cooking and eating beautiful food was the best!!! We laughed, we sang, we danced and left with full tummies and a warm heart. Thank you Sinh and Jessica for sharing a special day with us.
Rank_of_province: Số 76 trên 314 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hội An

Title: Haivenu Tours
Description: We have just returned from our 4th trip to Vietnam and the 3rd time we have used the services of Haivenu. They are a very easy company to deal with and we have found them totally reliable. If you’re thinking of traveling to vietnam, they are great to assist with internal transportation, by car, rail, aeroplane etc. making bookings where necessary. In past trips we have had many tours organized by Haivenu and they have always been exactly as communicated to us and always very enjoyable.
Rank_of_province: Số 229 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: Victoria Cruises
Description:
Croisière authentique dans le delta du Mékong en compagnie d’un équipage très sympathique et d’une guide francophone que nous avons adorée.
Sampan typique avec toutes les commodites , repas locaux… on vit à l’heure du Mékong avec les odeurs , les bruits, les sourires … bref c’était absolument magique.
Merci
Rank_of_province: Số 12 trên 48 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Cần Thơ

Title: Looking Glass Jeep Tours
Description: We had a great day with Mick, going by scooter! We headed up North via a new High Way not even taken into use yet and made some great pictures. He explained us a lot about the real Vietnamees people and let us swim in a hidden waterspring where only locals come. Then we went back via the east side, all the way up to Hai Van Pass. Mick showed us real bullets lying on the ground, coming from the war 50 years a go, where he knows a lot about. He’s a really kind and careful person!
Rank_of_province: Số 24 trên 248 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Nụ Cười Mê Kông
Description: Gia đình mình đã có một chuyến đi tham quan Côn Đảo vào ngày 17-19/07/2020 rất vui vẻ và thú vị, hướng dẫn viên Lê Phước Tình nhiệt tình, chu đáo, sẽ chọn tour của Mekong Smile vào lần sau😋
Rank_of_province: Số 13 trên 48 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Cần Thơ

Title: Mui Ne Local Surf School
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 8 Chuyến tham quan & hoạt động ở Ham Tien

Title: Footprint Travel
Description:
Footprint just wants to rob your money. We did the early morning Hanoi tour. They charge 65 USD per person and the tour definitely doesn’t worth that amount. It’s a tour that you can actually do it by yourself, just check on the travel blogs about the early morning tour and ask help from the hotel to arrange a taxi and go for it. To visit the wholesale flower market and the whole sale fruits and vegetables market at 5am is very safe. Both places are busting of commercial activities at that time, with police patrolling the areas, so there is no risk or danger at all. You don’t need such an expensive tour for this. Also, there is nothing really historical or cultural about this tour. After the visit of both markets you will have a stroll around the old quarter to see what you gonna see by yourself anyway. So. In conclusion, this tour lack of content to cost that much. In Vietnam that’s lots of money. You can even do a whole day Ha Long Bay for that price. Very bad footprint on trying to rob the tourist this way.
The tour guide was really nice and tried to do her best, but she even admitted that she thinks this tour is too expensive for the content it has.
Rank_of_province: Số 157 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Sapa Express
Description: Trải nghiệm xe bus giường nằm của Sapa Express khởi hành lúc 10h tối ngày 10/11 từ Hà Nội. Xe rất sạch sẽ và thoải mái. Mình đã ngủ rất ngon tối hôm đó mặc dù trước rất khó ngủ khi đi xe giường nằm. Cảm ơn Sapa Express, đặc biệt là a Hiếu lái xe rất chuyên nghiệp và bạn Sơn rất nhiệt tình và vui tính :). Các bận nên lựa chọn đi buổi tối để khỏi mất thời gian di chuyển và có nhiều thời gian khám phá Sapa hơn.
Rank_of_province: Số 4 trên 56 Phương tiện giao thông ở Sapa

Title: Cat Ba Kayak Adventures
Description:
Cat Ba Kayak Adventures had the perfect option for a self guided day of kayaking on Lan Ha Bay. We are experienced kayakers and were looking for an option that allowed us to spend as much time as possible on the water, without the many stops / structure of a tour.

This was perfect, we stopped by the pier mid day and quickly picked up kayaks. We were driven further out into the bay and agreed to return around sunset - that was all! From there we had the freedom to explore as much as we wanted. They were also great and gave us waters, hats, maps, etc. Definitely recommend.
Rank_of_province: Số 24 trên 75 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Cát Bà

Title: Vitawell Travel
Description:
Superbe visite et randonnée avec notre guide May qui parle bien anglais, est très souriante et accueillante et à su nous donner une magnifique vision de Sapa et des villages du Nord et de leur richesse culturelle en seulement quelques heures :) une excursion que je recommande les yeux fermés.
Pensez à prendre quelques dongs pour acheter des tentures Hmong en chanvre qui sont magnifiques sur place.

Lucie & Guilhem
Rank_of_province: Số 232 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: Mekong Eyes Cruise
Description:
We booked a 2-day Mekong Delta cruise with a transfer to and from Saigon. Our transfer was amazing, a luxury AC van to our boat in the Delta. Though we were supposed to be on a bigger boat with other people, we were upgraded and had a 2 cabin boat to ourselves.

My favorite thing about the cruise--the food. It was some of the best food we had in Vietnam! The chef was amazing!

I also enjoyed the orchard village tour, and seeing some of the things people do in the villages like making rice paper, puffed rice cakes, etc. Our guide Jonathan was great at explaining things.

I enjoyed being (and sleeping) on the Delta; its a special region!

I'd recommend this operator, hands-down.
Rank_of_province: Số 14 trên 48 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Cần Thơ

Title: EcoSapa Bus
Description: Lái xe trung nhiệt tình chu đáo. Xe chạy đảm bảo thời gian và rất chuyên nghiệp. Tạo cho chúng tôi cảm thấy an toàn và thoải mái

Title: Anna Booking Office
Description:
I purchased a visa to go to Vietnam on the advice of the country, I purchased the visa and then found out I could not travel from the UK. I tried to get a refund. This is what they said". Unfortunately, the state in which your visa is located no longer has the possibility of cancellation or refund. Your visa has been processed and sent to your email. We work to give you the best service and the fastest possible.
We want to thank you for your understanding and trust.
I think this is reidclous as it was the counrry that made me purchase the visa and now they will not give me a refund

Title: Hacoconut Boat Tour
Description:
Overall, a fantastic service and very enjoyable, smooth experience! 🤩👏 I booked the package for the boat ride with lunch, and arranged it for a day before, thinking it might be too last minute, but I was pleasantly surprised by how well and efficiently they handled the whole process. All my queries about the package were well handled ( total price, process of bringing us) before I decided to confirm my booking via whatsapp.

Although they typically pick up within Hoi An, they accomodated to my needs to pick us up from further away outside of Hoi An. Even taking the extra step to help compare the prices to taking a Grab service and offered a lower price for the pickup and return trip.

The boat ride experience itself was satisfying and worth it! Couldn't have asked for a better experience! We did crab fishing, boat spinning and took many photos from the friendly and lovely boatriders who made our time so memorable. 🫶🚣‍♂️ The lunch provided after also had a good variety of local dishes.

💫An additional service: My family also wanted to drop by to Hoi An Ancient town after the boat ride, so I requested if they were able to be included in the package and drop us there after. They were flexible and kind enough to accomodate to my needs! ☺️

Everything from the transport pickup from our hotel to the coconut boat ride, and including the drop off and pick up back home was extremely smooth.

Overall, it was very efficient, affordable, and I would definitely highly recommend the experience and service. The staff, the driver, the boat riders were always courteous, prompt, responsive and friendly and thank you to all of them for making our trip a memorable one. 🙇‍♂️🥰 Would definitely reccommend Hacoconut! 🥥
Rank_of_province: Số 28 trên 127 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hội An

Tôi ước thời gian tắm biển có thể kéo dài hơn.
các bạn nhân viên nhanh nhẹn và để ý tới nhu cầu của gia đình tôi, chắc chắn gia đình tôi sẽ còn quay lại.

Title: Vietnam Cycling Tours®
Description:
We took a trip with Vietnam backroads for my 50th birthday ten years ago and repeated with TWO trips for my 60th. Mr. Van and team did not disappoint - ABSOLUTELY thrilled with our experience! From helping us plan our bespoke itinerary to adapting along the way, the team at Vietnam Cycling Tours delighted us with their professionalism and flexibility. This review is for the Mekong Delta Trip, which included a week on the backend at La Veranda Resort on Phu Quoc. A perfect combination of biking and rest and relaxation. We biked about 25-35 miles per day and experienced small villages and rural areas that more visitors do not typically get to see. We enjoyed a nice balance of bucolic scenery during the day and the nightlife of smaller cities some of the evenings.

We found working directly with a company based in Vietnam and run by a Vietnamese team not only a MUCH better value than so many of the large bike companies (who hire companies like Mr. Van's anyway) but also a wonderful cultural experience not to be missed. The guides were super knowledgeable about the areas we biked through, in addition to being capable and professional bike guides. Whether you would like to bike 60 miles+ or do the 25-30 miles per day we did, you'll be in capable hands with this team. Because we requested it, Vietnam Backroads also arranged our week long trip on Phu Quoc at La Veranda Resort, the perfect place to unwind after the weeklong trip in the Mekong Delta.

We are grateful to Mr. Van and his team, especially our Mekong bike guide Dat, whose kindness and expertise we valued. Truly a wonderful trip!
Rank_of_province: Số 60 trên 425 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Crazy Tour

Sau khi kết thúc tour tôi thật sự hài lòng khi đi được tour mình mong muốn, đặc biệt công ty tôi đi cho dù mới thành lập nhưng dịch vụ rất tốt và đắp ứng được nhu cầu muốn tìm hiểu văn hóa các ngôi chợ tại Sài Gòn

Title: Pandaw River Expeditions
Description:
Looked like a very interesting Pandaw Vietnam river cruise and we originally booked in 2020. Then the Pandemic. They agreed to give a credit for another tour when possible. Then they bankrupted. Then they recapitalized and said they would apply our deposit on
another tour. When it was finally possible to do the trip in November of 2022, we paid the full trip amount of over $14,000.00. Their documentation stated cancellation would have to occur a month before scheduled travel. Two weeks
before the trip, my wife had a medical emergency with a dislocated hip and was unable to go on the trip on orders from doctors.
We had purchased trip insurance from Tripmate for $525 and filed a claim which was denied except for airline cancellation fees on fully refundable airline tickets. That amounted to about $1000. Pandaw would not offer a refund or even a credit for another trip citing their 30 day policy. As it stands, we are out $14,000.00 hard earned and difficult to replace. Pandaw is unjustly enriched $14,000.00. Tripmate is a fraud that needs to be sued but with cost of lawyers not possible unless some sort of class action since that seems to be their practice as we discovered too late.
Pandaw was rude when contacted nicely and did offer if we wanted another trip a modest discount. With their attitude and indifference to customer situations we would avoid them at all costs and advise you to do the same.
Rank_of_province: Số 33 trên 155 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Compass Travel Vietnam

Description:

Also, Chao, the tour organizer made a huge effort in taking my dietary restrictions (gluten free) into consideration. This is highly appreciated!
Rank_of_province: Số 8 trên 39 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Huế

Title: Dynasty Cruises Halong
Description:
Phòng ốc khá rộng rãi,có ban công riêng ngắm biển rất đẹp. Phòng tắm có bồn sục massage view biển tuyệt vời . Nhân viên rất thân thiện và hiếu khách. Các món ăn bữa trưa đầu tiên và bữa tối rất ngon. Tàu có các hoạt động Karaoke, chèo thuyền kayak, tham quan hang động miễn phí. Hướng dẫn viên và lễ tân rất tận tình, chu đáo khi dẫn khách tham quan.

Tàu phù hợp với những khách ưa hoạt động, đặc biệt là với ai thích hát karaoke giữa vịnh. Tôi đặt ở tầng 1, khá yên tĩnh, không bị âm thanh Karaoke ảnh hưởng. Internet ở tầng 1 dùng tạm được.

Điểm trừ : phòng không có TV và hướng dẫn viên đưa khách ra đảo titop vào thời điểm thủy triều lên, bãi bé và nước thì đục, xấu, nếu để sang ngày hôm sau thì bãi titop rất rộng.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 20 Giải trí về đêm ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Explore my Vietnam
Description: We had a super great day trip with Son and Tan. They are punctual, communicate well in English and they have a lot of local knowledge. my husband drove a motorcycle himself and has was guides between the other two bikes through heavy traffic in Da Nang, it was a very cool experience. We got to see a lot, while also having enough breaks along the way. Highly recommended. We were a family of 4, with two children aged 11 and 14 who also had a great trip. We have done a lot of fun in Vietnam but this was one of the best experiences.
Rank_of_province: Số 80 trên 314 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hội An

Title: Authentic HALONG
Description:
The boat is new and very clean. The surroundings are amazing and you really cannot get enough of the horizon.

Overall the crew is amazing! Davis was our designated waiter and did an amazing job. We were never thirsty, thanks Davis!
Rank_of_province: Số 12 trên 83 Phương tiện giao thông ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Origin Vietnam Travel
Description:
Origin Vietnam travel advisor Angela Thanh worked to customize this to Exactly our needs, wants, time frame and budget. I have been traveling since the mid-90s and this has NEVER happened. You guys are special.
The places we experienced, the amount of time we had for each and the overall pacing and variety were just amazing.
Mr. Tuy, our guide, was polite, informative, had answers to all questions and gave us a really great idea of what the Real Vietnam is. He was more like an informed travel buddy than a paid guide, which he was both. But he also gave us warnings, such as "When we get out of the car, there will be lot of women and girls trying to sell you something. Here's what to do..." Or, "I'll leave you here next to Sapa Station. Here's how you cross the traffic when cars and motorcycles are coming from every direction...."
Timelines: Communication was exceptional, from the moments before we got on the plane in Taipei until we said goodbye.
You know were didn't care for The View, BUT we LOVED SAPA and EVERY PLACE on the tour. Climbing up and down steps was challenging, especially CAT CAT, but that was part of the fun.
Balance, from the villages of Lao Chai to the hubbub of the Old Quarter of Hanoi, we just felt the electricity when we walked out the door., and we just felt alive every moment.
The Allure Hotel in Hanoi was perfect in every day, including the location, the room, the food and Especially the people who worked there. At the front desk, the woman Anna helped us set up Grab and we used it when we got far away at night. I loved pulling up a little blue stool and joining in really Vietnam life to have noodles on a summer night. You know what I mean.
I loved that we had free evenings in Sapa and Hanoi to explore, and we did. .
At Halong Bay, other than the cheap Kayaks, it was the experience of a lifetime. The captain, Mr. Ha Nguyen, and ALL the staff made this such a special experience. The people, including all Aspira workers, the excursions, activities and food were top - notch.
This company is 100 percent reliable. Our guide and driver met us at the airport and it was hard to say goodbye after a week
Rank_of_province: Số 252 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: My Easy Rider
Description: Suu Le and his friend picked us up at our hotel in Da Nang at 8am. He took care that our luggage was fixed safely on the motorbike. On our way to Hoi An he stopped at the marble mountains, Bana Hills, some local rice fields and various other points of interest. We felt safe during the whole ride and he really took care of us as well (offering cold water etc.). He explained a lot of things an gave local insights. The time schedule was very flexible and we arrived at around 5pm in Hoi an. We would recommend this tour for anyone looking for a trip outside of the city with reliable drivers and tour guides. Thanks again to both of you for this unforgettable adventure! :)

Title: Style Motorbikes

I recommend Style Motorbikes as they provide a fantastic service you can rely on.

Title: Go-Indochine
Description:
Ich hatte Travellocal &Go-Indochine angefragt, um mir eine individuelle Rundreise in Vietnam für vier Wochen zu planen. Nach kurzer Zeit schickte mir Phuong einen detailierten Reiseplan, der genau meinen zuvor geschilderten Wünschen entsprach. Sie setzte sofort alle Änderungsäußerungen um und beantwortete stets meine Fragen.
Als die Reise begann, bekam ich für Notfälle Phuongs und Lys Nummer für Notfälle. Sobald ich Ihnen wegen einer Kleinigkeit schrieb, antworteten sie innerhalb von Minuten und lösten sofort das Anliegen. Es gab während der gesamten Reise keine Probleme, woran die Organisation Schuld war, wenn überhaupt nur ein Missverständnis vorort, welches Phuong schnell lösen konnte.
Man konnte sich jederzeit auf Ly und Phuong verlassen.
Jetzt, da die Reise vorbei ist, kann ich mit Sicherheit sagen, dass man diese Reise nicht besser hätte planen können. Ich habe alles Wichtige gesehen und noch vieles mehr. Außerdem sah ich nicht nur die besonderen Tourstenziele, sondern konnte auch viele einheimische Eindrücke sammeln, die ich ohne Phuong niemals gemacht hätte. Die Hotelwahl war fantastisch. Alle Hotels waren vom Feinsten, sehr sauber und schick. Zudem waren alle zentral, sodass man überall hinlaufen konnte, was meines Erachtens von großem Vorteil war.
Diese Organisation ist sehr professionell und weiß genau was sie macht. Ich kann diese sehr empfehlen und werde meine nächsten Reisen mit Sicherheit wieder dort buchen.
Rank_of_province: Số 258 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

He was also very courteous, always opening my door for me and walking me to where the ticket line was and speaking with the seller to ensure I paid for what I wanted.

If you want a great, safe and knowledgeable driver, definitely make sure you book Hien when you come to Hue!

Title: AnyTrails
Description:
Thanks to AnyTrails, we had a really unique & tailor made return visit to Hanoi in November 2022.

We were keen on the local Market Garden tour, not cyclists at all but saw mention of Walking Tours, contacted Minh & was not disappointed.

Our day began with a walking lunch tour. Delicious Pho plus Hanoi Spring Rolls. Down lanes we went, Fish Balls on the way, to the BEST Bakery in Hanoi for the best Banh Mi EVER! The afternoon was spent at the local Market Garden, enjoying a very special smoothie, pleasant conversation & scenery.

We discussed a Ninh Binh outing & also a day exploring more on the back of Motor bikes while in Hanoi.

A jam packed moto adventure included the amazing Pottery Museum, crossing the Red River on a local ferry & a delicious Vegetarian lunch. Plus Flower & Vegetable Market Gardens close to the City. Loved being in the middle of traffic on the motorbike & felt very safe with our drivers!

Ninh Binh included a comfortable drive, stunning scenery, local towns, history & culture plus dining at a local restaurant specialising in Goat dishes. Minh pointed out the Cycling tour locations & if we wanted to cycle, had confidence he would cater to our fitness & cycle abilities. So maybe next time.

Minh listened & made suggestions for us as individual, mature age but young at heart travellers & his itinerary suited as down to the ground.
Highly recommend. Contact Minh, you will not regret the decision.
Rank_of_province: Số 179 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Aspira Cruises
Description: Một chuyến đi tuyệt vời cùng gia đình. Mình đã đi Hạ Long 2 lần, nhưng lần này mình quyết định đi cùng gia đình và thay đổi trải nghiệm bằng cách đi du thuyền và trải nghiệm ngủ trên biển xem ra sao. Sau khi tìm hiểu nhiều tour và du thuyền, mình quyết định book Aspira Cruises. Về cơ bản mình thấy các du thuyền không khác nhau là mấy, nhưng lựa chọn Aspira vì lịch trình phù hợp với gia đình đi khoảng 10 người, giá thành thì khá hợp lý so với target của mình.Tổng chi phí hết gần 40tr cho 10 người (8 người lớn và 2 trẻ em). Nhưng rất đáng đống tiền bát gạo :)))). Phòng rất sạch sẽ, nhân viên thân thiện, đồ ăn khá ngon, tuy nhiên tôm hùm thì hơi mini, nhưng rất đáng trải nghiệm nhé. À hôm mình đi thì karaoke lại hỏng mất nên buổi tối hơi ít hoạt động.
Rank_of_province: Số 79 trên 229 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Rosy Cruise
Description:
Overall this cruise was just OK. It was wonderful to experience the beautiful surroundings, however the accommodations are average. I’ll share some details that would have been helpful during my search:

The two options are for either 2days/1night or 3days/2nights. We opted for 3days/2nights. The longer trip includes a visit to the more remote Lan Ha Bay (via smaller excursion boat, for the day - you do not stay overnight in Lan Ha Bay). This was definitely the best part of the trip as we got to swim and cruise in the less populated area (and swim in an area free of trash, which is everywhere in the water in Ha Long Bay).

During the 3 days, there are groups shuffling on and off the boat - the cruise ship stays in Ha Long Bay, and passengers are shuttled to and from the dock via a transfer boat. That’s why you will see options for both the 1 night and 2 night stays so frequently. It is definitely an efficient system, but I was under the impression this was a Lan Ha Bay cruise ship and more time would have been spent there. It seemed that this was generally the same program as all the other cruise ships. The cruise companies are definitely efficient and churning thousands of tourists a day from Hanoi to the Bay and back.

I think the 2 night stay was well worth it - if you’re going to spend the time to come all the way out here, you may as well stick around to see Lan Ha Bay - nature at its finest with fewer tourists.

The food was ok, we enjoyed the lunches but the dinners were subpar. Service was very friendly for the most part. There is a loudspeaker in each guest room that wakes you up daily at 6:30am for breakfast, which was quite early for us.

Overall, glad I did it, but when you are part of a large group / ecosystem of tourists like this, you trade off a personalized experience.
Rank_of_province: Số 80 trên 229 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Description: Hạ Long rất rất đẹp!!! Gia đình Mình đã có 1 chuyến du lịch tuyệt vời ông mặt trời. Ai cũng vui và thích lắm. Title: VietAsia Travel
Description: VietAsia organized a complex tour (hotels drivers, guides, flights) of Ha Long Bay, Ninh Binh, Saigon, Dalat, Danang, Hoi An, Hue, and Hanoi seamlessly. It was exactly what our family hoped for and created the most memorable family vacation! All the guides were knowledgeable fun and engaging without being intrusive or pedantic. I would recommend VietAsia to anyone who asks.

Title: Go Viet Travel
Description:
My wife and I recently booked our trip to Vietnam through Go Viet.
It was the best trip we have had by far in terms of how the itinerary was planned.
We visited places like Hanoi, Ha long bay, Danang, Hoi Ann, Phu Quoc and Ho Chi Minh over a span of 16 days. The hotels we booked through Go Viet were top notch. We had absolutely no issues with traveling and sightseeing for the tour guides were extremely knowledgeable and very helpful. Travel and sightseeing through the places was on luxury buses that added to our comfort throughout the trip.
Ms. Oanh Ha from Go Viet ensured that we never faced any issues during our trip, she was always a call away incase we needed help.
I highly recommend for everyone going to Vietnam to get in touch with Oanh and book through Go Viet that's if you like comfortable Luxurious and a hassle free holiday.
Rank_of_province: Số 182 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Mekong Prestige II
Description: My wife and I, along with another couple, did a seven-day cruise down the Mekong from Cambodia to Ho Chi Minh City on the RV Mekong Prestige II. We all loved every minute of it. The rooms are large and well appointed. All the staff were friendly and helpful, especially Marianne the cruise manager, who ensured everything ran smoothly. The meals were excellent and each day they were varied with an excellent range of choices. There were daily tour options to see a variety of local sights and meet the people. A special mention about the tour guide we had in Cambodia, Som, who was the best tour guide I have ever been with. He was a champion person as well! We met plenty of new friends on the cruise and would recommend it to anyone wanting to visit this part of Southeast Asia.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 4 Chuyến tham quan & hoạt động ở Cái Bè

Title: Da Nang Outdoor Adventures
Description:
Tôi đã có những bài học Surfing rất tuyệt vời với Da Nang Outdoor Adventures. Huấn luyện viên surfing đã hết lòng giúp tôi để tôi có thể cảm nhận được sóng, biết chơi surfing và tự tin với môn thể thao mới. Tôi đã có thể tự lướt sau 3 bài học, và thuê một ván lướt sóng Soft top dễ dàng. Tôi thực sự yêu thích việc trải nghiệm mới với surfing tại Đà Nẵng.
Giá cả rất hợp lý để bạn có thể trải nghiệm môn thể thao này. Tôi nhận thấy Da Nang Outdoor Adventures xứng đáng được đề cử cho bạn, đặc biệt là người Việt Nam. Hãy tin tôi, bạn sẽ không bao giờ hối hận khi đến với họ.
Rank_of_province: Số 4 trên 88 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Sun Yoga and Spa Hoi An Academy

Rank_of_province: Số 16 trong 134 hoạt động giải trí tại Hội An

Title: Hoi An Scooter Adventures
Description: Loi was a great host for our day in Da Nang. He is friendly and personable and made us feel like VIPs. We visited the Marble Mountains on a scooter journey. It was my first time being a passenger on a scooter and Loi was a careful driver, this part was really fun for me. I am so glad we chose to have a guide at the marble mountains as we would not have known anything about the history of the place or how best to navigate the site without Loi. It was a hot day (by my standards!) when we went and Loi provided multiple cold water bottles which were very appreciated! Loi taught us about life for the local fisherman and we were able to see the bamboo boats up close. We also visited the Lady Buddha up close which we didn’t realise was included so that was a big bonus! and then Loi took us to some of the most spectacular viewing points to see over the city. We also saw lots of monkeys!! Loi then took us to a hidden away cafe that was super cute and we had the most delicious coconut coffees. Loi shared lots of recommendations about local restaurants and foods to try and told us stories about his life. He is a natural host and has great English skills. He also took lots of photos for us which was great! Would highly recommend booking Loi for a jam packed and memorable day out and to learn about Da Nang from a lovely local!
Rank_of_province: Số 29 trên 248 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Đà Nẵng

Nous recommandons les yeux fermés

Title: Indochina Charming Travel
Description:
I booked a private tour of 8 pax for 6D5N in Da Nang, Hoi An & Hue. We stayed in 4* hotel, rooms are big & clean. most importantly it’s within walking distance to tourist attractions, it’s so convenient.

The tour was well organised with an experienced tour guide who has more than 20 years in tourism industry. Rest assured that he will not bring you to go shopping instead he is more keen to share the history and culture of Vietnam with you. We are glad that we got to know more about Vietnam history from the tour guide.

I’m thankful to come across Indochina Charming Travel.
My family and friends enjoyed the trip and bring home a memorable experience and happiness.

This is the 3rd time I visited Vietnam and I’m sure I will come back again. This lovely country has so much to offer.

Title: Mekong Trails
Description: I traveled to Vietnam with a group of college students on a video journalism course and their professors from New Jersey. I'm fortunate to have done lots of traveling and to have had excellent guides on most of my trips. But our guide in Vietnam, Long Nguyen, was the best ever. He is extremely knowledgeable, very professional , flexible and friendly, with a great sense of humor. He saved the day for us a couple times by finding people for us to meet when the people who were originally scheduled canceled. What impressed me the most about Long, however, was his concern for the students, as shown by the help he gave them in doing their interviews. He was also very solicitous about my needs as a senior citizen.
Rank_of_province: Số 67 trên 425 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Source Kiteboarding
Description: It all feels very unprofessional. Wrong guidance if anyone cares at all. Old material and accomodation. Not very save and all is somehow very srtrange. Not worth the high prize.

Title: Style Motorbikes

Description: Vriendelijke ontvangst zowel in Hue als in Hoi An. Bij aankomst een gratis biertje om de rit goed af te sluiten. Materiaal was prima om de tocht mee te voltooien, en de routebeschrijving was duidelijk

Description: Enjoyed the travel in Hoi An. Pick up service was spot on. Earlier than on time and more than happy to accommodate our needs. They let us hire a local guide with us and kept us happy. Thank you for your service 🙏

Description: Had a great tour to Ha Long Bay Ninh Binh and Sapa. The company was great in helping us. We also stayed in the hotel.

Title: Ha Giang loop tour 1

Rank_of_province: Số 6 trên 49 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Giang

Title: Vietnam eBike Tours
Description: We were looking for something different from the usual tours. After comparing, we decided on this eBike adventure exploring the trails around the lake. Couldn’t be happier with our choice! The battery powered eBikes really helped to make the cycling more relaxed and we cruised and covered many kms. Highly recommended and many thanks Pierre and team.
Rank_of_province: Số 68 trên 425 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Letoilevietnam
Description:
Nous voudrions avant tout vous féliciter pour votre professionnalisme car l’organisation fut parfaite !

Nous n’avons jamais attendus ni les chauffeurs ni les guides et nous avons vraiment passés un moment fort agréable dans votre pays magnifique.

Notre guide préféré fut Dung parlant parfaitement français et toujours prêt à nous rendre service et aux petits soins pour nous.

Nous avons beaucoup appréciés le trek a Puluong et un coup de cœur pour la Baie d’Halong avec une nuit à bord d’une jonque magique.

Merci encore pour tout et à la prochaine fois…
Rank_of_province: Số 197 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Marko Tour
Description: Заказали с супругой до поездки в г. Нячанг у туроператора "Открывая Вьетнам" две экскурсии. Первая прошла удачно ,а во со вторым путешествием в Даклак вышел казус. Из-за ажиотажа с коронавирусом группа не собралась.Но ребята оперативно отреагировали и предложили поехать от компании "Марко Тур" по тому же маршруту. Мы согласились и тысячу раз не пожалели. Путешествие ОГОНЬ. Гид-проводник Миша просто классный профессионал своего дела, в которое он просто влюблён и всю нашу группу влюбил в .этот дивный край - провинцию Даклак. Всем советуем ехать не задумываясь и не сомневаясь.
Rank_of_province: Số 30 trên 142 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Nha Trang

Title: Min's Ha Giang Travel
Description:
- Hà Giang là một trong số điểm đến mà mình chắc chắn sẽ quay lại. Với các thác nước tự nhiên, góc núi rừng và muôn trùng dãy núi này tới dãy núi nọ, sự hoang sơ vẫn còn khắp nơi sẽ mang trải nghiệm cực kỳ thích thú với những bạn thích sự yên tĩnh, thích sự đơn sơ và một chút cảm giác mạnh với các cung đường đèo vào mùa mưa tháng 7.
- Bên Min có tư vấn mình kĩ và cũng sắp xếp giúp mình một anh hướng dẫn viên (private tour không ghép đoàn), anh Phúc rất tận tâm, cùng mình đồng hành và chụp hình rất là nhiều.
- Trên hành trình di chuyển và khi ở khách sạn ở mỗi điểm dừng chân buổi tối, mình được gặp rất nhiều bạn từ đoàn khác, hầu hết là các bạn nước ngoài, rất thân thiện, vui và uống rất nhiều =))) coi như đi một mình mà không giống một mình chút nào.
Rank_of_province: Số 7 trên 49 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Giang

Title: Vietnam Travel Advisory
Description: My family and I are satisfied customers under Stella’s service. We originally booked Rita Cruise for our Halong Bay cruise but they have canceled on us due to the weather and they were not operating on the days we are able to do so. So, I contacted Stella if she knows of a cruise that is operating on those available days we have left before we head home to Singapore. And yes voila, she found the best room at Athena cruise with excellent service. Couldn’t ask for better. I am definitely going to contact her again when I visit Vietnam once again. Thank you for your excellent response Dear Stella. She is prompt and helpful.
Rank_of_province: Số 57 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Culture Pham Travel
Description: Ms. Xi was amazing. Best tour guide I’ve had in Vietnam. She did a walking tour of the Hue Imperial City, and tailored everything to what we were interested in. We didn’t have much time in Central Vietnam so she made sure to include a lot of the history that we otherwise would have gotten at other sites. The tour was also advertised as 2.5 hrs but she was with us for 3.5, and willing to stay longer at no extra charge. She also answered all of our many historical questions beautifully and gave us some great local food recs! Highly recommend :)
Rank_of_province: Số 22 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Vietnam Discovery
Description: Been in contact with this travel company for a while before I finally booked a day trip to Ninh Binh and I’m really really satisfied with their service. They’re highly professional and are extremely customer friendly. And Joy Vu in particular has been the nicest. Totally recommended.
Rank_of_province: Số 200 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Indochina Best Travel Company Limited
Description: One of the best journeys in Vietnam i had because i booked with indochina best travel company especially Ms. Xuyen which she planned all the 10 days itinerary for me and it had the best hotels and resorts in Vietnam and the she booked for me tours which were great with smooth and on time. Thank you Xuyen for your efforts. I do really recommend to book with them.
Rank_of_province: Số 201 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Trang An Tours
Description:
Thật sự ngạc nhiên và choáng ngợp trước phòng cảnh thiên nhiên hùng vĩ nơi đây, khai thác du lịch rất chuyên nghiệp, các cô lái đò rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình, các di tịch được trùng tu và bảo tồn rất tốt.
Thật tự hào khi Việt Nam sở hữu một vẻ đẹp hoang sơ bình dị mà không kém phần thu hút
Rank_of_province: Số 13 trên 75 Chuyến tham quan & hoạt động ở Ninh Bình

Title: VJT Adventures
Description:
14 dagers rundreise i Vietnam der høydepunktet var 5 dager i nord med Jeeps. Helt suverent!!

Itinerary at a glance:
Day 1 (25/9): Hanoi arrival – Welcome Dinner
Day 2 (26/9): Hanoi – Ban Gioc Waterfall
Day 3 (27/9): Ban Gioc Waterfall – Nguom Ngao Cave – Secret Mountain road - Bao Lac
Day 4 (28/9): Bao Lac – Meo Vac
Day 5 (29/9): Dong Van - Ha Giang
Day 6 (30/9): Ha Giang – Hanoi
Day 7 (1/10): Flea Market – City Tour with Military Museum and Woman Museum
Day 8 (2/10) Hanoi free day ( Site Inspection Capella and visiting Harley Davidson Hanoi)
Day 9 (3/10): Hanoi – Halong – Lan Ha Bay
Day 10 (4/10): Lan Ha Bay – Cruise on Orchid Classic
Day 11 (5/10): Halong Bay – airport Hai Phong – Saigon
Day 12 (6/10): Saigon – Cu Chi – Farewell Dinner
Day 13 (7/10): Saigon – Fly home
Rank_of_province: Số 69 trên 425 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Happy Holiday Private Tours
Description: Tour giới thiệu nhiều điểm tham quan thú vị, hdv thân thiện và nhiệt tình, dịch vụ khá tốt, m chắc chắn sẽ lựa chọn tour cho chuyến đi tới 👏😘😘😘

Title: Ivy Travel Agency
Description:
Ivy is just the greatest travel agent you'll find in Hanoi!!
She is so kind and helpful, she is so organized and helped us plan our whole trip to Vietnam:)
She first got us the visa invitation letter within a short time, then we consulted her about where to go around Hanoi and what she recommends in town and she gave us great tips and even suggested some changes to our plans which were awesome!!
We love Ivy and we highly recommend her! You won't regret it :)
Rank_of_province: Số 202 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam Tour Fun
Description: All the excursions we went on were excellent, especially when we visited the river island. I really enjoyed working with clay and trying to make something local. Our tour guide in Bangkok was fantastic, very polite, and really introduced to us Thailand in the best way. The Samet island was lovely too, it wasn't too crowded, and we could enjoy some privacy. It definitely was an unforgettable experience for us. Vietnam Tour Fun did an amazing job in organizing the trip from the excursions, to our meals, and always provided fresh water for us. Thank you!
Rank_of_province: Số 115 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Asia Journey Travel
Description: Die Fahrer waren immer sehr pünktlich im Hotel erschienen. Die Fahrzeuge waren sauber und in gutem Zustand. Für alle Mitfahrer wurde Mineralwasser zur Verfügung gestellt. Wir wahren sehr zufrieden!

Title: Nha Trang Apanda Travel
Description: Những hoạt động team building rất vui, sôi nổi và mang tính kết nối cao. Hướng dẫn nhiệt tình, vui tính và am hiểu. Chắc chắn sẽ tìm đến Apanda lần nữa vào lần tiếp theo ra Nha Trang

Title: DinHo Ecotour
Description:
Great experience, a much more quality and human touch than in any other place in Vietnam. The goide - Mr Thanh - was not only very kind, but most important very open for our interest in Delta and very involved to give us the best experience.

We were traveling throug Vietnam from north, so in Ben Tre we were already after two weeks of different experiences, with smiling tour operators selling services and later not relevant or even untrue services delivered. With Dinho Ecotour it was different! Open and helpful people, very human and friendly, but not fake smiling and most important incredible good treatment and all exactly as is should be for a local tour in local boat and food in homestay. :)))

ps. Mr Than - one of the coconuts is still growing :)))
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trên 21 Chuyến tham quan & hoạt động ở Bến Tre

Title: Slow Travel Hue
Description: We had an excellent time cycling around some private houses with considerable history & beautiful gardens / architecture. The company was thoughtful and provided a cyclo (rickshaw) for my son while my wife and I cycled - a great way to get to know the local area and way of life. Good food and some unusual experiences (e. g. foot bath) were included.
Rank_of_province: Số 23 trên 84 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Huế

Title: Hue Motorbike Adventure - Day Tours
Description: We had the best time with our guides! Dzung was hilarious and had such great energy all day! We stopped at such beautiful spots, our favourite beings the pristine and almost empty beach where we had lunch. The guides were also great at acommodating to what we wanted and even took us a tailors in Hoi am at the end of the day. Would 100% recommend, we had the best day ever!
Rank_of_province: Số 29 trên 133 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Huế

Title: Viet Package Travel
Description: Great tour company, we went on the Halong Bay overnight cruise and the Ninh Binh day tour, both were well run, with excellent and knowledgeable tour guides.
Rank_of_province: Số 298 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: Vivu Halong
Description: Đồ ăn trên tàu rất tệ. 2 đứa mình đi về đều bị ngộ độc và không có bất kì hỗ trợ nào từ công ty hay hướng dẫn viên. Tàu cũ, ngột ngạt. Nhà vệ sinh không hoạt động. Không đáng tiền. Đóng 1.200.000 cho tàu Ha Long luxury nhưng được đưa lên tàu Hạ Long Excursion. Quá thất vọng. Nguyên tour không được cung cấp nước lọc. 1 chai nước 330ml giá 40.000đ cắt cổ. Chuyến đi khủng khiếp.
Rank_of_province: Số 205 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Open Smile Travel
Description: Một chuyến đi thật tuyệt vời với không khí trong lành, ẩm thực ngon tuyệt, người dân thân thiện. Điều đặc biệt dịch vụ của open smile travel rất tuyệt vời, các em hướng dẫn thật nhiệt tình và chu đáo. Thanks!
Rank_of_province: Số 15 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Flipside Adventure Travel
Description:
If you are looking for the right company to do the Ha Giang loop with then look no further than Flipside because it really doesn’t get any better than this.

From the moment of arrival Tom and Lyn created the perfect experience for our 4 days on the loop. They were so kind and passionate and this is reflected in every detail of what they offer. In a small group we were able to truly experience the places we visited rather than just passing through as a photo opportunity. Flipside will take you off of the main tourist route to some indescribably beautiful locations. Along the way we were able to meet local communities, stay in fantastic homestays (not just warehouses full of 100 mattresses) and eat amazing meals in for every meal. The evenings are fun and varied each night, but here there is also no pressure to drink if that is not something that you enjoy.

The drivers are also truly cared for by this company and so provide an incredibly safe and enjoyable way to do the loop. This we did not fully appreciate until we saw the practices of some of the other companies we ran into.

We cannot thank Flipside enough for the wonderful memories we will take away from our time with them
Rank_of_province: Số 300 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: Le Journey Halong Cruise
Description:
Thật tuyệt vời, chuyến đi giúp tôi có những trãi nghiệm thú vị, gặp được những người đồng hành đáng quý. Có một chút vấn đê về phòng nghỉ nhưng không đáng kể, hướng dẫn viên và các chú nhân viên hỗ trợ xử lý nhiệt tình!

Cảm ơn anh tour guide rất nhiều.!!
Rank_of_province: Số 13 trên 83 Phương tiện giao thông ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Ninh Binh Tourist Center
Description: Great service provided by Nam. He drove us around Ninh Binh, waited patiently always smiling and helpful. Without him the experience wouldn't have been the same. We'll miss you Nam, as much as we miss Vietnam!
Rank_of_province: Số 3 trên 30 Phương tiện giao thông ở Ninh Bình

Title: Move Asia Travel
Description: Mình vừa có chuyến du hý thái lan thật tuyệt vời. Các bạn hướng dẫn viên vô cùng chuyên nghiệp và thân thiện. Dịch vụ từ booking đến mọi thứ đều rất hài lòng 💯💯
Rank_of_province: Số 58 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Ha Long Bay Lux Cruises
Description: Really great service, Mr Tony was contact with us after we booked and provided all information of trip. The cruise was amazing, 5 Star cabins and looks exactly like the photos. The staff were so friendly and helpful. Food was delicious and staff were accommodating to food allergies and dietary requirements. Loved the kayaks and exploring the caves, and really enjoyed the swimming. Transfer from hotel was very good and great communication throughout.
Rank_of_province: Số 56 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Indochina Holiday Travel
Description: In 2022 my wife and I joined IndoChina Holidays on a Trek/Cycle Tour of Laos. We were accompanied by four friends so a total group size of six (all 55 yrs plus plus). The experience was fantastic and I would thoroughly recommend it. It wasn't a restful holiday though...but the people, food, culture and scenery were well worth it. We were met by the Team in Luang Prabang and taken to remote villages for three days of trekking - it was very remote and the trekking was challenging. We stayed in villagers' primitive houses who had not seen Westerners since before Covid - it was a privilege to stay in their homes and experience their way of life. Something none of us will ever forget. We then climbed on our bikes for some very challenging cycling (distance and gradient) and to cover the full distances you would have to be a very accomplished cyclist. We worked with the Team to shorten the routes on a daily basis and to just take in the best parts of the routes - this worked really well and the Team were incredibly accommodating. The places we visited, the views we saw and the experiences we encountered were extremely memorable - well done IndoChina Holidays. A trip for the experienced traveller but if you put the effort in you get back great rewards - and yes I'd wholeheartedly recommend. Thank you IndoChina Laos Team you were fantastic.
Rank_of_province: Số 302 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: La Casta Daily Cruise & La Casta Premier Cruise
Description: Nhân viên tư vấn rất rõ ràng và nhiệt tình. Dịch vụ đẳng cấp 5* mà giá tiền 💵ở mức vừa phải. Ko có gì để chê dc 👌👌👌
Rank_of_province: Số 14 trên 83 Phương tiện giao thông ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Viet Bridge Legend
Description: Viet Bridge does an incredible job of creating personalized trips according to your budget. I have used them for several trips to Vietnam and they always do a brilliant job. They hire the highest quality guides and provide amazing accommodations and excursions. I highly recommend them for any southeast Asian trip you are looking to take! They make you feel like a rockstar rolling through Asian first class!!!
Rank_of_province: Số 207 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Nha Trang Daily Tours
Description:
Trải nghiệm tour 3 Đảo ViP cùng CanoTour thật tuyệt vời, với bữa ăn ngon, hướng dẫn viên nhiệt tình dễ thương, chụp ảnh rất có tâm. Cảm ơn Cano Tour đã cho 1 ngày trải nghiệm thật tuyệt.Nha Trang không chỉ đẹp mà con người rất dễ thương!
❤❤❤
Rank_of_province: Số 31 trên 142 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Nha Trang

Title: Tran Nguyen Travel
Description:
Hướng dẫn viên vô cùng nhiệt tình.
Bữa trưa đơn giản nhưng rất ngon, vừa miệng.
Mình thích nhất hoạt động chèo kayak, tuy nhiên đi vào mùa đông lạnh quá nên ko tắm biển được, chắc chắn sẽ đi một lần nữa vào mùa hè
Rank_of_province: Số 29 trên 75 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Cát Bà

Title: MANTA Sail Training Centre
Description: The experience was amazing! I rented a sailing boat (Laser Radial) and at first I received some instructions from the super sweet owner Julia. After the refreshment instruction one of the Vietnamese teachers joined me on board to guide me a bit (my last time in a laser was a couple of years ago). After 15 min he jumped out and swam back to the beach. I just had to pay the actual minutes I was sailing and even the short breaks (the wind was quite hard) where timed which I didn’t had to pay. After the sailing we had some watermelon and we chatted a bit. The ambiance is very nice and relaxing! Because of the amazing experience I went twice! A friend of mine did a starter course and she learned a lot in one day! I highly recommend it!
Rank_of_province: Số 7 trên 26 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Mũi Né

Title: Good Morning Vietnam Travel
Description: Our friend refers James Bui from Good Morning Vietnam to us. We are family of 4 on a private tour to Danang for holiday. On arrival, the driver – “LOC” welcome us at the arrival hall at Danang International airport and drove us for a great Vietnamese lunch, restaurant’s ambient is good and food very nice. We had the best White Rose at Hoi An Market; fantastic dinner at Hoi An; great buffet lunch at Bana Hill; unique and delicious lunch at QUAN NANH Hue. When we plan for the tour, James did ask us the food we like and dislike. And the food he arranges for us was very delicious and very much better than those Vietnamese food in Malaysia. James also advises us which mobile provider to use and help us to get the sim pack ready. We save our time on searching and just get the sim onto our phone when we are on the comfort luxury van at airport. The tour guide “Too” is nice and helpful, he done a good job to take care of us throughout our travel. My wife ordered own design dress from B'Lan Silk Hiệu, and “Too” help us to talk to the tailor and she got her dress in 24 hours. The hotel are great with nice breakfast! I have shared my great experience we had with Good Morning Vietnam to my friends upon returning to Kuala Lumpur. They told me that they will sought the service from Good Morning Vietnam when they want to visit Vietnam. We shall see James in our next trip to Hanoi.
Rank_of_province: Số 120 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Thich Quy Nhon Private Tours
Description:
Nếu bạn đến Quy Nhơn du hí một mình và cần một người bạn đồng hành thì hãy thử một lần trải nghiệm tour du lịch Kỳ Co Eo Gió bằng xe máy của Thích Tours. Bởi vì đích thị tour này được thiết kế cho mình và các bạn đó. Bản thân mình đã có những trải nghiệm đầy mới mẻ và thú vị trong hành trình một ngày thăm Kỳ Co Eo Gió cùng Thích - bạn HDV của mình. Ngoài cung cấp nhiều thông tin hữu ích về vùng đất này thì Thích cũng giúp mình lưu lại nhiều tấm ảnh đẹp nữa, đi một mình nhưng ko sợ cô đơn nha. Nói chung là bạn í rất nhiệt tình và có tâm; và mình thì cảm thấy hài lòng :)
If you travel alone, try this Ky Co - Eo Gio tour by motorbike. A private tour guide will accompany you. It feels like travelling with your friend. Come and have some fun. Thich will treat you well :)
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 13 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Quy Nhơn

Title: Hanoi Foodie and Cycler
Description: I just arrived from the tour with Anna and Andy, they are the best guides in the world. They know about history, they are funny and also very kind person. I recomend to everyone who wants to spend some quality time in Hanoi.
Rank_of_province: Số 60 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Nghê Spa Residence
Description: Hội An là một nơi tuyệt vời. Đến Hội An đc thưởng thức cảnh đẹp, đồ ăn ngon và không thể không nhắc đến các dịch vụ nơi đây, đặc biệt tôi muốn nói đến Nghê Spa ở 324/2 Nguyện Diệu Huy, massage ở đây thì không phải nói, không gian đẹp và thoáng đãng, đến nơi bạn sẽ được ngâm chân trước và lựa chọn dịch vụ mà mình mong muốn như: massage vai, chân,....Khi ngâm chân xong bạn sẽ được tận hưởng những dịch vụ mà mình đăng kí trước đấy, massage nhẹ, vừa tuỳ ý mình. Cô chủ spa thì quá ư là nhẹ nhàng, thân thiện và đáng yêu. Thật muốn quay lại nơi đây vào các lần tiếp theo quá à.
Rank_of_province: Số 88 trên 314 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hội An

Title: Viet Nam Pure Travel
Description: Mình có nhờ Viet Nam Pure Travel thiết kế cho mình tour đi Đà Nẵng, Hội An và Nha Trang, chuyến đi vô cùng tuyệt vời, trên cả mong đợi. Mình được bạn giới thiệu nên biết đến VN Pure travel, bạn mình đã đi và rất khen dịch vụ các bạn ấy đặt cho nên mình tin tưởng luôn và qua chuyến đi mình cũng đánh giá rất tốt, mình sẽ giới thiệu công ty cho bạn bè của mình. Cảm ơn các bạn rất nhiều.
Rank_of_province: Số 26 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Biking Around Vietnam
Description: This was such a great experience! We were a group of 7 adults and there were two crew members with us at all times. The guide spoke decent english and did his best to answer our questions. The bicycles looked brand new / very very well maintained and has 7 gears. We did a mixture of city and countryside for more than 3 hours. Highly recommended.
Rank_of_province: Số 308 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: Nguyen Adventure
Description: 人從頭都沒出現，也沒聯絡過我，我也聯絡不到他，但我的卡似乎已經在網上刷了，這算詐騙嗎？我該報警嗎？？
Rank_of_province: Số 209 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Ecoway Travel: Ninh Binh, Halong, Sapa, Hanoi Tours
Description: Lily was very friendly and knowledgeable. Trip was beautiful and the bike ride was the highlight. Lots of photo opportunities
Rank_of_province: Số 63 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Công Ty TNHH Du lịch Mở Việt Nam
Description:
Mình đã từng đi tour chùa Bái Đính (Ninh Bình) do một cty du lịch khác tổ chức. Cá nhân mình cảm nhận những điều như sau:
- Hướng dẫn viên du lịch không tìm hiểu về đối tượng khách hàng của bạn. Lý do vì sao mình nói như vậy? Ở Tour Bái Đính, chị hướng dẫn viên cực nhiệt tình khi vừa nói tiếng Anh vừa nói tiêng Việt. Cơ bản, vì cha mẹ mình không nói được tiếng Anh, mình nói được nhưng chị vẫn nhiệt tình giải thích tiếng Việt cho cha mẹ mình, dù đa số khách trong đoàn là người nước ngoài. Điều này, làm cha mẹ mình rất hài lòng. NHƯNG, ở tour của các bạn, các bạn hướng dẫn viên chỉ nói tiếng Anh, mà không hề hỏi cha mẹ mình hay gia đình người Việt khác là họ có hiểu được ngôn ngữ đó hay là không? Điều này làm cho cha mẹ mình rất không hài lòng vì họ chả hiểu gì, chả được cung cấp bất cứ thông tin gì, thậm chí một phần tự ái vì họ không hiểu bạn đang nói vấn đề gì.
- Kiến thức của các bạn chưa đủ hay do thái độ của các bạn không đủ đam mê vơi nghề nghiệp? Ở tour Bái Đính, chị hướng dẫn viên không chỉ giới thiệu, nói liên tục ở địa điểm tham quan, mà dọc đường đi, chị ấy vẫn giới thiệu liên tù tì về các địa điểm dọc đường. NHƯNG, ở các bạn, các bạn dường như chỉ nói cho có lệ, và rồi các bạn để mọi người trong khoảng lặng suốt đường đi. Điều này làm mình nghi vấn là các bạn không tìm hiểu thêm bất cứ thông tin gì về hành trình hay sao? Vì mình nhớ là khi học nghiệp vụ, các bạn không chỉ được học giới thiệu địa điểm tham quan mà còn phải là tour guide trên xe bus cơ mà (mình cũng học về Tourism nên mình biết). Đặc biệt, lúc tham quan hang Sửng Sốt, tour guide của bạn thậm chí không cung cấp thông tin như ở travel agency khác. Mình đang chụp hình nên vô tình nghe được thông tin từ đoàn khác khi họ giới thiệu về hang động. Trong khi mình không nhận được bất kì thông tin nói về nó khi đi chung với đoàn của bạn?
- Khi đang trong giờ ăn trưa trên SilverSea Cruise, thì nhân viên trên tàu lại bảo là "đang đi qua hòn Gà Chọi - một trong những biểu tượng của Vịnh Hạ Long - nên ra chụp hình". Thì gia đình mình đi ra, vì họ giưới thiệu riêng bằng tiếng Việt. Trong lúc gia đình mình đi ra thì các bạn nước ngoài ngơ ngác không hiểu vấn đề gì đang xảy ra, do tour guide của các bạn không hề giới thiệu bất cứ điều gì cả.
=> Mình hy vọng các bạn có thể training lại tour guide của các bạn.
Cảm ơn
Rank_of_province: Số 210 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

The driver was skillful and safe

Title: Drifters Paddle Co.
Description: From start to finish the paddle boarding experience was amazing, from paddling through the mangrove forest to chilling on the board watching the sunset. It's been a massive highlight of our travels.Sam was fantastic, he takes so many beautiful photos and is just a genuinely nice guy!We had an amazing day. Would highly recommend.
