The night camp was amazing when my little son Evan can made a fire while my first son and I set up the tent and collected woods.
After that we are planning another night camp in the park, may be some peaks of bidoup nui ba

Title: Indochine Junk
Description: On a fait une croisière authentique à la journée au départ de Catba pour être immergé dans la baie de Lan Ha et le golf du Tonkin. On a été émerveillé par la beauté sublime des montagnes karstiques la vie sur l'eau ici. C'est à refaire!
Rank_of_province: Số 51 trên 75 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Cát Bà

Title: Sapa Trekking Adventure
Description: This was an incredible experience - truly could not have done this on our own. Over three days, we trekked ~40 kilometers in the Sapa region with a knowledgeable, friendly, local guide. Our guide Chu (Sinh’s cousin) even invited us to her home for an amazing home-cooked lunch on the second day - talk about hospitality. We stayed at nice homestays each night with home-cooked meals provided by local families. They are not luxurious, but they are comfortable and it was nice to connect with locals and other travelers. Be prepared to sweat and make sure to bring comfortable shoes - this is a workout but you’re surrounded by some of the most beautiful hills, mountains, valleys, and rivers imaginable. Book this now!
Rank_of_province: Số 80 trên 152 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Sapa

Title: Mỹ Sơn Daily Tours
Description: Around an hour driving from Da Nang, My Son Holy Land with ruined towers left but interestong to see. I had one more day left in Hoi An so my friend recommended booking this tour. I got enough information about the tour from the travel agency that called: My Son Daily Tours. The qoute was rather high but acceptable for a private trip.

Description:
Our guide Anne was outstanding. She made our visit to HCMC extras special. Her knowledge of Vitamins history amazing. She was extremely professional, friendly and kind.
We highly recommend her to lead tours in Vietnam.

Title: Emily Private Tour
Description:
We booked a private tour through C-Vietnam Travel and Emily was our tour guide in Da Nang and Hoi An. She was punctual and very professional. She answered all of our questions thoroughly and gave us excellent insight into the Vietnamese culture and history. She gave us plenty of time to peruse the scenery and main attractions of each item on our itinerary, at our leisure.

We would highly recommend her.
Rank_of_province: Số 129 trên 206 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hội An

Title: Lý Mỹ Sơn Travel
Description: Arranged for the My Son afternoon tour the day before. Texted via WhatsApp and confirmed pick up between 1300-1315. Hai, the driver, was right on time and we picked up our tour guide, Uncle Chin on the way, because Chin had done an AM tour and needed to have a short break. Had a pleasant ride to My Son and Uncle Chin told us a few things along the way. We saw part of the ruins before the show as Uncle Chin has done this plenty of times and knows the ins and outs. We had sites left to see after the show so while the crowd queen for the carts back to the start, we utilized that time to see the remaining sites in virtual solitude. After completing, we caught the cart back and our van back toward Hoi An. We stopped at a dock and were picked up for our sunset boat ride to Hoi An. We were given soup on the ride and the opportunity to purchase beer or soda for $1. Boat dropped us in Hoi An where the van picked us up for the return to our hotel. 500,000/person, well worth it!!
Rank_of_province: Số 73 trên 127 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hội An

Title: SunBay Cruises

Description: Nơi có bầu không khí thoải mái, đồ ăn ngon, nhìu trò chơi thú vị, phục vụ chu đáo, nhìêu dịch vụ hợp lý.
Rank_of_province: Số 87 trên 207 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Khánh Hòa

Title: Halong Bay Vietnam
Description: A beautiful spot, BUT the boat was talked up by Tom the host and was well below what we anticipated. On route to the main boat it was described as 5 star and less than 4 years old. Well our room on level 1 was next to the engine room and you couldn't hear yourself when under way. Considering the boat was not full room 102 should never be used. The rooms outdoor balcony had a broken door and could not be locked to seal the noise from the engine and the chairs did not match with one not having a cushion. The shower had a broken soap holder. The room looked run down. The food and beverage was great but once you ordered a drink you had to wait far too long. All emphasis was on larger groups, couples did not get much attention. The canoeing was fun and the fishing activities were also great. The excursions was well below what we expected as we expected a cave visit but instead visited a horse shoe bay that was nothing special. At the end of the tour we were asked to complete a survey and when the host was informed of our issues he did not handle it well leaving us no confidence that he would address the issues for future travellers.
Rank_of_province: Số 137 trên 229 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Vietnam Tours BN
Description: Le personnel était absolument agréable et toujours à l'écoute, soucieux de votre confort. On avons bien aimé notre croisière insolite de 2 nuit à bord d'une jonque traditionelle de charme. Nous avons passé des moments formidables dans cette Merveille naturelle qui nous fait toujours rever. La prestation avec Luxury Tours a été très bonne aussi bien sur les moyens de transport, la restauration et l'hotelerie. Le guide qui nous a accompagné s'appelle The et il parle un français parfait, ce qui n'est pas facile à trouver au Vietnam, toujours prêt à nous renseigner et nous informer sur la vie des gens et l'histoire du pays. On vous conseille de demander cette agence pour organiser une telle croisière
Rank_of_province: Số 369 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Trung Tâm Du Lịch Phong Nha - Kẻ Bàng
Description: We booked a tour for kayaking in Phong Nha Cave. The guide team during our tour was very professional and caring. The lady who received our booking was also very nice and helpful. Highly recommend this place.
Rank_of_province: Số 4 trên 4 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Vườn quốc gia Phong Nha-Kẻ Bàng

Description: Excellent value for money . Well organised day trip . Guide speaks good English. Lunch as a great seafood done in the local style. Boat out to 3 places then shirt bus trip back to hotel
Rank_of_province: Số 11 trên 58 Phương tiện giao thông ở Nha Trang

Title: Trang An Golf and Country Club
Description: This golf course and resort is perfect for golf and family gatherings/holidays. My family and I came here 10 times since April 2022. Became a member here since my son, 10 yrs old, enjoyed playing golf and camping here. Beautiful scenery and wonderful staff. Will revisit any time we can ❤️
Rank_of_province: Số 37 trên 57 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Ninh Bình

Title: Halong Bay Vietnam
Description: Excellent experiment. Mr Dai was extremely entertaining. I’d definitely recommend this to my family and friends
Rank_of_province: Số 138 trên 229 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Sapa Tour Daily
Description: Sapa's valley is breathtaking with mountain sides filled with multi-tiered rice terraces. There are a few companies offering this one day tour. This tour will take you into two distinct villages: Lao Chai and Ta Van. They are habited by the Hmong ethnic people. Ours was a 7 km walking tour. We visited a primary school and a day nursery. We were also able to visit a local's house. This was a bit intimidating for me but I guess the owner gets some sort of remuneration. BEWARE!! The locals will start offering you their goods (trinkets, bracelets, purses, etc.) right from the minute you step out of your vehicle at kilometer 0 and will pursue you constantly right through kilometer 7. So...it will take all of your power and patience if you do not want to by anything. Getting mad at them will not work because there will assuredly be another vendor to entice you to buy. Good Luck
Rank_of_province: Số 81 trên 152 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Sapa

Title: Mountain Light Travel
Description:
Morgens früh wurde ich am Hotel abgeholt der Reiseleiter kam in die Lobby und brachte mich sicher über die Straße zum bus.
Mir wurde am Vorabend per Whatsapp mitgeteilt das man zwischen 8-8.20 Uhr zu mit kommen würde am Ende waren es 8.40 Uhr aber bei dem Verkehr kein Wunder.Der Bus war sehr komfortabel mit viel Beinfreiheit und USB Anschluss
Nachdem alle Leute abgeholt wurden fing unser Reiseleiter Hoan an zu reden und einen mit den wichtigsten Informationen zu informieren.
Die fahrt sollte ungefähr 3 Stunden dauern mit 2 pausen.Die erste Pause war eine Toiletten pause von 10 Minuten, die zweite eine Pause von einer halben Stunde auf einer Perlenfarm diese hat eine an eine Kaffefahrt erinnert aber immer hin war es interessant zu sehen wie so etwas hergestellt wird.
Als wir in Halong angekommen sind ging es auf das schiff mit zwei Etage unten Esszimmer oben Aussicht deck
An Board gab es dann 10 verschiedene Vietnamnesiche Gerichte mir wurde sogar extra was vegetarisches serviert.
Als erstes wurde the amazing cave besichtigt danach Tiptoe Island wo man sich aussuchen konnte ob man schwimmen möchte oder 400 Treppen hoch laufen möchte kann ich aber jedem nur empfehlen toller Ausblick danach ging es weiter zum Kajakfahren bzw bamboo boat trotz regen.
Nach einem anstrengenden tag ging es dann wieder 2 1/2 Stunden zurück mit kleiner essenspause
Ich war erst skeptische Weil es noch keine bewertungen auf TripAdvisor gab aber ich kann es jedem nur wärmstens ans Herz legen
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trên 7 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Sapa

Title: Cho thuê xe máy Hạ Long - Minh Motor
Address: Green Bay Premium Building, Đường Hoàng Quốc Việt, Hung Thang, Vịnh Hạ Long 200000 Việt Nam
Description: We were more than satisfied! We got the scooter at a fair price. He also picked up the scooter at our hotel or got us a shuttle to the hotel. We wanted to continue traveling afterwards and he helped us by bus and drove us to the bus station. In addition, he and many gave really good recommendations for food, cafe and sights. It couldn't be better!
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 1 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hung Thang

Title: Arcady Boutique Cruises
Description:
The van taking us from Hanoi to Ha Long Bay was very comfortable. At the Bay, we boarded a boat - there were only 11 of us. The lunch was excellent- plentiful and very fresh. Our tour guide was fantastic- very knowledgeable, friendly, and well-spoken.

The cave is quite large but it doesn’t appear to be active. Our guide said that there are sections in which visitors are not allowed. Most of the cave tour involved being shown figures in the formations.

The Tiptop island has a lovely beach where you can relax or play volleyball. I did the hike to an observation point at the top of the hill. This involved climbing many steep and sometimes uneven steps. The climb is also quite crowded.

I would recommend this trip.
Rank_of_province: Số 139 trên 229 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: GIALAI ECOTOURIST Co.,Ltd
Description: Chuyến 06 ngày của gia đình tôi thành công tốt đẹp, hdv chuyên nghiệp, dịch vụ tốt, hoàn hảo. Chuyến đi gắn kết tình thân các thành viên trong gia đình. Hdv chuyên nghiệp, lái xe rất tốt,khách sạn đẹp, ăn rất ngon
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 5 Chuyến tham quan & hoạt động ở Pleiku

Title: Vietnam Tourist Sim
Rank_of_province: Số 189 trên 425 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Bicycling Vietnam
Description:
孫の夏休みに3泊4日のメコンデルタのサイクリングを孫と2人で楽しんできました。
体力的に付いていけるか心配をしていましたが、ガイドのPhucさんがゆっくりとしたペースで先導をしてくれたので、景色を楽しんだり、ビデオ、写真などを取りながらベトナム南部のメコンデルタを満喫してきました。
Rank_of_province: Số 190 trên 425 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Joy Camping Vietnam
Description: Chỗ này nhiều chỗ chơi nên trẻ con rất thích. Đến đây hồi tháng 12, mình và chồng được lần đầu trải nghiệm cắm trại ngủ lều, nướng BBQ. Thời gian di chuyển chỉ 1,5 giờ
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 1 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hòa Bình

Title: Halong Bay, Vietnam
Description: La Bahia de Ha Long sigue siendo un lugar espectacular e imperdible para visitar al ir a Vietnam. Es un lugar paradisíaco, con un paisaje incomparable, que recuerda el mundo de Avatar, pero cerca al mar. Hay que visitarlo al menos una vez en la vida.
Rank_of_province: Số 33 trên 83 Phương tiện giao thông ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Daily Vietnam Tours
Description:
We booked with a local travel agent in Hanoi and our tour guide from "Vietnam Daily Tours' was Mr T , they picked us up at the arranged time which in our travel experience was a first so started off well and only got better throughout the day albeit very long which we knew from the start,(to do Halong bay from Hanoi and back is a LONG DAY) Mr T was a wonderful guide very Knowledgeable and quite different from other Vietnamese guides who can be very brash and annoying, He was gracious and very pleasant but able to guide all 25 or so on the bus with what felt like a personal touch from pick up time until drop off some 13 hours later.
Had a great day at the bay, wonderful weather which always make it good..
Totally recommend these Guys and if you can get Mr T your tour will be the better for it.
Rank_of_province: Số 260 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Scuba Zone Diving

Title: Bien Dao Tour Nha Trang
Description:
Do nằm cách biệt với đất liền nên để ra đảo này, nhóm tụi mình bắt buộc phải đi tàu (gỗ hoặc cano), thời gian chỉ vào khoảng 30 phút để đến Cụm Bãi Bàng – Đảo Dừa (Bãi tắm Robinson).
Ngoài ra du khách tới đảo dừa còn có thể đi tàu khám phá những góc nhìn mới lạ của hòn đảo, có thể thưởng ngoạn cảnh hoàng hôn trên biển và về đêm cay nồng men say bên ngọn lửa bập bùng, cực kỳ thích thú và ấn tượng vẻ thơ mộng này.
Phù hợp cho các hoạt động vui chơi giải trí, sinh hoạt nhóm đông và ở lại qua đêm cắm trại. Tuy rằng đặt tour của An Nam tour nhưng mình thấy nơi đây đem đến cho du khách những hình ảnh đẹp cho chuyến du lịch ý nghĩa.

Title: Travel Hub Vietnam
Description:
From our first contact by email, the representatives of this company made our visit to Vietnam super easy.
They met us at the airport and we were through the Visa process in minutes, leaving behind all those in our plane who were waiting for their stamp.
We planned a boat trip through Halong Bay for my husbands birthday and it was perfect- they even arranged for a cake! We did a cave tour and overnight stay in CatBa island. We met back up in Hanoi and They became our friends throughout our stay in north and south Vietnam, popping in and out for airplane transfers, car rides, hotel reservations and food tours. I honestly don’t think our trip would have been as enjoyable without them.
They customized each part of our trip according to our needs and budget and we never felt like we were really in a “tour”
Highly recommend them!

Title: Tonkin Cruise
Description:
Traveling from south to North escaping the heat and rain that followed us from HCMC through our adventures to HoiAn and Hue, we were finally in Hanoi. The weather was amazing and my friend and I took no chances with making certain the weather would be perfect.
We booked with Tonkin Cruise because the one day on Halong Bay was all around the best on all our shopping points: first the earliest start and arrival to board the ship of the 1 day cruises we considered. Local pick up at your hotel/hostel in old quarter of Hanoi made it easy to start our day at 7:00 am. We picked up a group of just under 20 people (2 being children under 10). This was accomplished in 40 minutes! By 8:00 am we were leaving Hanoi and made a rest stop for 10 minutes before arriving at Tonkin Harbor to board our ship by 10:40 am, ahead of schedule.

The ship is well maintained, clean and even luxurious for a one day cruise. Beautifully set tables for dining, a dozen lounge chairs to sun on and relax and enough seating all around the outdoor deck areas. There are shaded areas and the main deck entry conversation corners to also make and get to know new friends.

The toilets are all fully functioning, immaculately kept and all around the Tonkin is a lovely ship. Staff are friendly, Captain always has his doors open today hello and food is delicious and varied. Special dietary needs and allergies were also a concern if the staff in initial booking and again on day of cruise.
The route through the limestone hills and islands allowed for a good survey of the Bay and it’s most beautiful views.

We had ample down time between the many events planned: Kayaking, swimming or lounging in hammocks began our days’ events. Land transfer and a cave tour was a break from the ship, landing on Cat Ba Island. A spring roll making class followed as we also enjoyed fresh fruits and tea on our way back to Tonkin Harbor for sunset.

WiFi access is a available—so says the tour informational Booklet, but we were never told of this by our guide.

Our English speaking guide managed to keep us all on schedule and afforded us the promised FULL DAY on the water we wanted from 11am until sunset.

The cruise was US$70/person and booked the night before. All went according to plan promised us.

Beer and other soft drinks are available for a reasonable price onboard. Water was provided on bus to boat and lemon tea while on the boat.

Bus has AC and is clean and comfortable.

All-in-all, an excellent cruise, well managed and guide “Hung” is so pleasant and funny.
Great value for a full day!

You arrive back toHa our by 8:30pm
(See attached Agent Sales book pic)
Rank_of_province: Số 141 trên 229 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: Mui Ne Tour
Description: It's a Great Trip in Mui Ne, Viet Nam. Our guide Ha is a great tour guide, She led us to visit some places such as White sand dune, the Fairy Stream... We love the tour and our tour guide. The weather in Muine is hot but it is great for swimming. It was lucky that we found Mui Ne Tour and book with them. Hope to see you guys in future at Mui Ne or maybe other cities. This time was short to see all things in Muine. We definitely will come back to see it again. Thank Mui Ne Tour Team.
Rank_of_province: Số 33 trên 52 Chuyến tham quan & hoạt động ở Mũi Né

Title: Vietnam Motorbike Tours
Description:
Went on a solo guided trip to cu chi tunnels from ho chi minh ciry along with Mr. Tam who made a good trip, great.

Had no expectations apart from riding a 150CC city bike when i booked and when i met Tam and spoke to him for a few mins on my way to the bike pick up point from my hotel i had made up my mind that im upgrading my bike.

Tam quickly upgraded my bike to a 400 CC at a very nominal cost and we we both were geared up to start the trip.

All i was expecting was a Tar mac road trip but our pal brought in various legs of off roading with his well aware detours from the main roads which made it completely enjoyable.

I would recommend this guys as the guide too as he is bit only knowledgeable about vietnam but can enlighten you about various global topics and make your breaks even more interesting.
Also he paid for all entries and meals and refreshments which was a total surprise and an amazing gesture from the most genuine guy i met.

Thanks for the wonderful trip Tam. Hope to see you soon for another amazing journey together.

PS: all shots were taken by Tam who shot this while riding his bike ahead. Truly talented man.
Rank_of_province: Số 201 trên 425 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Công ty cổ phần vận tải hàng không miền Nam
Description:
I have traveled a couple of times to Ho Chi Min City and required a vehicle to take me to Vung Tau. I contacted this transport company and was greeted by a wonderful helpful young lady (Nana). WHAT EXCELLENT SERVICE!
I would recommend to anyone requiring transport to use this company. the contact point was at the IBIS Airport Hotel.

Title: SUP Tour Vietnam
Description: My family and some friends of ours visited Hanoi for 4 days, and we booked kayak tour to Lan Ha Bay with Sup Tour Vietnam. Quan was our guide for our entire time on Cat Ba Island, and I cannot recommend him enough. He was super friendly, and very knowledgeable. He was always keeping us safe, entertained and interested at all times. The kayaking tour was incredible. Lan Ha Bay is beautiful. It was an amazing experience which I will never forget! Definitely recommend this tour!!

Title: Xin Chao Travel
Description: On arriving in Hanoi we had no arrangements for our 2 week tour of Vietnam. Thankfully we came across Christian who helped us not only with our days in Hanoi but arranged the majority of our transport around the whole of Vietnam, from trains, busses, boats and even hotels. Our transfers from Hanoi to Ha Long Bay, Nimh Bình and train to Da Nang were arranged perfectly, with even contact from Christian throughout our travels to ensure everything ran smoothly. His knowledge of his country is exceptional and I highly recommend any tour through this company!

Title: Mango Motorbike Rentals
Address: 163 Lê Quang Đạo Bắc Mỹ Phú, Ngũ Hành Sơn, Đà Nẵng 550000 Việt Nam
Description: Na bestudering van reviews op internet, bij Mango terecht gekomen. Twee keer in korte tijd een scooter gehuurd. Grab werkt hier overigens ook perfect, maar het is gewoon fijn dat je zelf kunt gaan en staan waar je maar wilt. De prijs is echt uitmuntend. Voor 100.000 dong, ongeveer 4 euro, heb je een volautomatische scooter voor een hele dag. Scooters zijn niet helemaal nieuw, maar het functioneert allemaal prima. Uiteraard ook met helmen. Ook voor mijn zoontje was een kinderhelm beschikbaar. In Vietnam hebben de kinderen overigens geen helm op, heel apart. Vriendelijke, lieve mensen die je kunt vertrouwen. Je kunt hier trouwens ook je vuile was wegbrengen. Ik beveel Mango zeker aan!
Rank_of_province: Số 101 trên 248 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Victoria Experience
Description: The boat from Victoria Chau Doc Hotel made the journey to Phnom Penh by the river very pleasant, luxurious and interesting. Very good seats (with a sleeping position) and a lot of room for your legs. Very clean toilet on board. Drinks, fruit and biscuits were complementary. The explanations of ms. Trang made the trip even more interesting. We were also very glad with ms. Trangs efforts to arrange a smooth visum process at the border.

Title: Motogo
Address: 81 Nguyen Kha Trac, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description:
Motogo là một trong những địa điểm thuê xe máy uy tín nhất tại Hà Nội mà mình đã từng thuê. So với các cửa hàng khác thì dịch vụ của Motogo tốt hơn rất nhiều. Đặc biệt xe khá mới và nhân viên thân thiện.

Mình sẽ quay trở lại thuê xe lần tới khi cần.

High recommend cho mọi người!
Rank_of_province: Số 608 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam Royal Tourism: Private Day Tours & Cruises
Description: Vì chỉ biết Công Ty & Ms. Thuý qua Web site, nên chúng tôi rất lo cho những chuyện không vừa lòng có thể xảy ra, vì chúng tôi đã trả một 1/2 tiền đặt cọc trước để công ty & Thuý lo cho tất cả KS & vé máy bay khứ hồi : Sài Gòn-Phú Quốc-AngkorWat- Hội An-NhaTrang-Sài Gòn-Mekông Delta cho suốt cả gần 4 tuần với nhân viên đưa đón riêng từ mỗi sân bay. Tuy nhiên sau khi trao đổi thư từ với Ms. Thuý & đi được 1/2 cuộc hành trình du lịch thì chúng tôi rất yên tâm vì được tiếp đón an toàn theo lịch trình mà chúng tôi đã đồng ý với Công Ty & Ms. Thuý trước khi về VN. Thuý rất kiên nhẫn & chịu khó làm hài lòng khách hàng. Tôi không dễ tính ...& rất hài lòng với phương cách làm việc của Thuý. Tôi sẽ tiếp tục để Thuý & công ty của Cô giúp tôi , và giới thiệu bạn bè, tất cả cho mỗi chuyến đi về thăm nhà , mà không hề lo xa nữa. Tôi rất tin tưởng Thuý. Thuý rất thành thạo cả 2 Anh ngữ & Việt ngữ. Tôi vui mừng biết những người như Thuý : sinh trưởng sau này với một trí tuệ cầu tiến Thông minh -Giỏi & khéo léo . Mong Công Ty sẽ thành công nhiều trong năm 2015.
Rank_of_province: Số 382 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Pony Club Hanoi
Description:
I took my daughter for her first experience on a Pony - she was so excited to go but they experience was a real let down.

We were told to walk around and see the animals - many of them were thin looking half starved - I am no expert in the field but it just felt all wrong -

My daughter was unceremoniously plonked on a pony by a morose elderly word who clearly wanted to be elsewhere - he didn’t crack a smile or day a word - just led her up a hill and back - which was pretty much the whole experience - I had to walk with my daughter and hold her hand the whole time as she was so scared of the situation and the guide!

It was a nasty badly managed experience .
Rank_of_province: Số 611 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: Apricot Cruise
Description: You leave the bustling city and head out in the river cruise boat with design open on all sides to allow river breeze to flow freely, it takes down the Mekong. You get a chance to observe local lively activities from the comfort of your boat. We stopped at the local market saw wholesale coconut market, some local families and gained insights into local traditional methods to utilize every bit of the coconut, how to make local cake etc. We also met a veteran who provided his perspectives of American and Cambodian war.

I try to stay in three star hotels and up wards, they are always clean and all welcome you as if you have stayed with them before.

There are many attractions that would suit young children, teenagers, singles, couples, and the elderly.

Description:
Do visit if staying Da nang.
Beautiful area where Lady Buddha stands.
Marble mountain I visited was Water Mountain. Take the lift up as still fair amount of walking different levels. Lovely statues.
Dragon Bridge, the dragon breathes fire every Saturday and Sunday night at 9pm, all traffic stops, unmissable!
Enjoy beautiful Da nang and area.
Suggest 4/5 days though we stayed for 9.

Title: Du Lịch LATOUR Đà Lạt
Description: Had an amazing day visiting the Dalat countryside. Had a personal driver on a motorbike who spoke excellent English and explained everywhere and everything we went to. Had as much time as I wanted to explore each site. Visited a cricket farm, coffee plantation, rice wine distillery, Elephant Falls, a pagoda, and a village. Also stopped for lunch along the way. Overall I highly recommend. Booked the morning of.

Title: Hoi An Eco Palm River Tour - Day Tours
Description:
Simply had a great day. We hired bikes from where we were staying in Hoi An (Thao Hieu Homestay) and rode down to Cam Thanh Village, taking our time and exploring the local surroundings.
On arrival we had lunch and a couple of rehydrating 333's. The Banh Xeo (rice pancake with pork and shrimp) sounded delicious but in the end I opted for the open faced wantons which were also excellent.
After lunch it was into the round wicker boats (local version of a Coracle I guess is the best way of describing it) for an hour or so paddling amongst the palms.
The locals were friendly and engaging and could not do enough to ensure we all had a special day.
Just a great way to relax, meet the locals and have a bit of fun and a good laugh.
Rank_of_province: Số 208 trên 314 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hội An

Title: YEN BAI ECO TOUR
Description: We are a group of international students from different countries in Vic Uni of Wellington, New Zealand. This is our trip in Vietnam but so far it is one of the best trip we’ve ever had. We’ve heard that Vietnam is such a beautiful country but we were still amazed by the beauty of the nature in Yenbai. I love the food of the ethnic people in here, the taste is very different, but in a super good way. I wish I can stuff heaps of those dishes into takeaway boxes and bring back to NZ. I was very impressed. The trek and the bicycle tour was nice. The homestay was nice as well, friendly staff, very helpful and the house was clean. I love it. People in Vietnam are generally very friendly, I think. Oh, swimming in the waterfall is a MUST. Overall, we are very happy with everything in this trip.
Rank_of_province: Số 266 trên 456 Đồ ăn & Đồ uống ở Hà Nội

Title: Ruộng Bậc Thang Sa Pa trail
Description: The trail begins when Lao Chai street connects to main road TL152, few kilometres, you climb down on concrete road. You can get to the point with taxi, motorcycle or walking 30 minutes from Sapa with good pace. In peak season, there are many people with tour guides. We had bad luck as heavy fog was sitting in valley but later got brighter and warmer. The trail will lead you to spot to see the rice fields. You can come back and follow direction to Tan Van village through Muong Hoa valley. Extreme nice mountainous scenery, fresh air and rice field. Good shoes, especially when rains and water and special attention for winter 🥶 time You can spend there whole day but be aware about weather change quickly and get ready with water 💧 or snack
Rank_of_province: Số 34 trong 48 hoạt động giải trí tại Sapa

Title: Lao Chai Trail
Description: This trail starts in same point as Ruộng Bậc Thang Sa Pa trail. It is almost ten kilometres long through Muong Hoa valley with hundreds of rice fields, many villages. You can start from Tan Van village or at cross road where Lao Chai street meets TL152. Mostly concrete road, sometimes you pass bikes or smaller truck. Fantastic nature, fields and many local ethnic people selling souvenirs. Good shoes, water needed. Winter time is more challenging for being careful and well dressed than summer person. Sometime, you are lucky to buy something in villages. You meet many local ethnic people selling souvenirs
Rank_of_province: Số 35 trong 48 hoạt động giải trí tại Sapa

Title: Cat Co 3 Beach
Description:
Just 2km from the center of the Cat ba shopping center is the most spectacular perfect white sand beach that no western tourists have any idea that it exists.
Catch a taxi to the " Pearl of the Orient Front entrance"
Opposite the entrance is a public walkway to this pristine beautiful white sand beach with sun umbrellas and sun lounges all along.'
Almost no westerners even know about this despite the fact that you could walk to it in 30 mins from the town.
The waves crash in, the view is spectacular, and the landscape is outstanding.
Most western tourists pass through Cat Ba without ever visiting this beach, which is the best-kept secret in town.
Rank_of_province: Số 13 trong 13 hoạt động giải trí tại Cát Bà

Title: TripGuru Hanoi
Description: The whole experience was beautiful. Our tourguide Hung was super friendly, informative and funny! Food was great and there was a lot more than I thought so please don’t eat before you go and waste the good food they prepare (: Only thing I would change would be to have a bit more time on the boat ride back to the wharf! After such a nice day and after making friends with a couple of people, we would have liked to relax on the deck and drink beers while watching the sunset to end the night.

Title: Victory Cruises
Description: Had a fabulous 2 night/3day cruise on Halong Bay as part of a Mercury Vietnam Odyssey trip. Loved our cabin which was spacious enough for the trip. Very clean & most areas seemed to be well maintained. We had no issues. Middle deck had dining room and upper deck was for chilling. Sunbathing on the deck & nice drinks up there in the evening. Drinks were a wee bit pricey we thought. Food was amazing & beautifully presented & service professional. Lots of fish/seafood, but non fish people were well catered for too. Scenery was spectacular and the trips out in the tender were enjoyable. There was even night fishing. This cruise was one of the highlights of the whole trip. Thoroughly recommend.

Description:
My tourguide was a young student , he was very hillarious and excellent knowledges, she took me to go around the Saigon city, from D1 to D3 to see the local area which was located in the central area and it made myseft really suprised because i have never seen it before, we went around the flower market and cambodian street food to try the cuisine and enjoyed the local beer. after that we went back to D4 to see the Saigon river in the night time which was very gogerous and mysterious . I highly recommend this tour to every one
Dear
Bela

Title: Hoi An Water Coconut Forest Tour
Description:
We went to the water coconut area by taxi who dropped us off at the restaurant where the basket boats start. The taxi then wait d for us to get back. Apparently this is the standard so they don’t have to call a new one.

They bargained hard for the boat. Online says 150,000 and they started with asking for 800,000! In the end we paid 300,000 for 2 ppl. The tour was nice but has turned into a party tour rather than an eco tour imho. They essentially row you briefly through the grove and then to an open area with blaring music and ppl putting on a show. I tried to communicate that this is not what we wanted to see but with limited English it was difficult.

Aside from the ‘party’ this was a nice few hours out of Hoi An.
Rank_of_province: Số 86 trên 127 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hội An

Title: BRG Kings Island Lakeside Golf Course
Description:
A mature course that is located on an island. It is not too crowded, even on a Sunday. Had a great golf experience. A group of 11 of us had fun. The course was still quite well maintained. Some of the holes are quite challenging. The golfing staff was mostly helpful. While assigned caddies may vary with experience, generally, they know the course quite well. Line reading assistance was pretty good.

However, do be prepared to wait for your food at the club-house eatery. The staff is less motivated and unless you speak Vietnamese, ordering of food may be challenging as they tend to send the newby to take your order.

Overall, it is quite fun to golf in King's Island. Thank you
Rank_of_province: Số 636 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam Today Travel
Description: I was recommended Vietnam Today Travel by my friends who have traveled with the company. I also tried to find some Vietnam agencies on internet. There are a lot of agencies which will promise you so much. It can make you very confused. Luckily, I got very helpful suggestions from friends. I firstly, requested the tour to Vietnam Today Travel and go the reply very fast (just in some hours). I was surprised that they called me and give me very useful information about my trip which made me secured.As soon as we landed into the airport, we were welcomed by a guide – Mr Toan. The guide was excellent because, he always made me feel at ease straight away and gave us much information about the destinations. During the tour, the company staff called me some times to ensure my safety and suitability of the tour. All my questions were answered efficiently. I highly recommend this agency to any of my friends and will surely use their service again

Title: Xe Ôm Tours
Description:
This Xe Om tours (motorbike tour) was fantastic. This is the best way to see the popular sights in Hoi An and surrounding areas. Being on a motorbike is actually much easier and comfortable than other transportations.

We visited Hoi An ancient town and several neighborhoods that not to be missed. Our tour guide, Mr. Vu was a very nice and informative man. We learned a lot about the history of Hoi An.

If you're visiting Hoi An, you should take "Xe Om Tours", definitely recommend this fantastic way to see all different types of places,

Thank you!

Title: ET - Pumpkin Travel
Description: Prior to my trip, i had read many negative reviews about this Train service so, it's an understatement to say i was really nervous. To my surprise, my cabin shared with 3 other strangers was pretty pleasant - the cabin was pretty clean and we saw no roaches. However, the cleanliness of the sheets is questionable as mine had a smell (travel with a sleeping bag liner) The AC was directly above our heads on the top bunk so, being frozen the entire night was very unpleasant. The public toilet was smelly but, if you're an Asian living in Asia like myself, it isn't anything too terrible, lol. The train left and arrived on good time. Hot drinks are available first thing in the morning, if you are ready to pay (20k per cup). Overall, the entire experience was much, much better than anticipated. I was lucky.

Title: Vung Tau Surf & SUP School
Description:
I usually like to support local vendors(this owner was Russian, his name was Aram) but had no other option on this beach. That man was the rudest business owner I have encountered while travelling. Unhelpful when asked about surf conditions and slightly annoyed even. No advice as to which areas to avoid and which to target as a beginner. No help whatsoever for new tourists to the area looking to get a feel of the conditions surrounding.
Finally, board rental prices were ridiculously expensive. I believe he quoted us 20 USD for 4 hours (extremely high relative to the Vietnamese currency).

Title: Kite Family
Description: Всем привет! Только прилетели из Муй-Не. Море, солнце, пляжи... Но я хочу поделиться с теми, кому интересно не только это, но еще и активные действия. И вот для этого есть замечательная школа Kite Family, находящаяся на пляже отеля Ocean Star, на пляже стоит желтая табличка с названием. Его инструкторы - настоящие профессионалы своего дела, ничего лишнего, четкость и слаженность действий. Я занимался с Евгением кайтсерфингом, и хочу сказать большое спасибо за профессионализм, позитивный настрой, и за то, что, несмотря на то, что это совсем не просто в таких погодных условиях (большие волны, подводные течения и т.п.), с его помощью мне все таки удалось почувствовать эти супер ощущения от полета! Также хочу отметить, что здесь не тянут из людей деньги просто так и не гоняют учеников зазря (наблюдал такие случаи на пляже), то есть если ветер рваный или дует не в ту сторону, тебе просто говорят об этом, и ты приходишь заниматься именно тогда, когда условия для этого подходящие, не тратя ни лишних сил, ни времени, ни денег. И за это тоже отдельное спасибо! Также спасибо Дмитрию, с ним и я, и моя супруга, впервые попробовали серфинг, и это тоже очень интересно, доступно, информативно, хотим тоже заниматься в дальнейшем. В общем, очень рекомендую эту школу и для тех людей, кому интересен кайтсерфинг, и для тех, кому интересен серфинг, и для всех тех, кто любит заниматься спортом под правильным присмотром и грамотным руководством настоящих профи, а также просто очень хороших и позитивных людей!
Rank_of_province: Số 23 trên 26 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Mũi Né

Title: Green Travel Viet
Description:
Gia đình chúng tôi gồm 12 người ( 9 ng lớn và 3 trẻ em ) đã có chuyến du lịch dài ngày cùng Green Travel Viet từ Huế đi Hà Nội - Ninh Bình - Hạ Long - Mộc Châu - Sapa vào dịp hè vừa rồi. Nhờ nhân viên tư vấn nhiệt tình nên tôi tin tưởng lần đi này sẽ đi cùng công ty để trải nghiệm những vẻ đẹp của Miền Bắc cũng như Tây Bắc, thay vì chọn đi Miền Nam như 1 cty khác cũng đã giới thiệu cho chúng tôi ( thật ra Miền Nam thì chúng tôi cũng đã đi 1 vài lần rồi ). Đúng như chúng tôi đã đặt niềm tin, sau khi kết thúc chuyến hành trình, chúng tôi hoàn toàn hài lòng về dịch vụ, từ ăn uống ( rất ngon và nhà hàng sạch sẽ ), chỗ nghĩ ( dù yêu cầu chúng tôi ko cao nhưng cty đã bố trí ks vượt mức mong đợi ), hdv ( quá nhiệt tình và giúp đỡ chúng tôi xuyên suốt hành trình. Đặc biệt khi trong gia đình tôi có người bị sốt đột ngột, HDV đã đi rất xa bên ngoài khu vực của chúng tôi để tìm mua thuốc, nhờ đó chúng tôi mới có thể tiếp tục cuộc hành trình mà ko bị gián đoạn )........
Thật sự chúng tôi rất hài lòng và gởi lời cảm ơn đến công ty. và trong những chuyến đi tới, có thể chúng tôi lại nhờ đến cty Green Travel Việt.

Nice and friendly people, strict as a teacher (as it should be) they'll take care about your safety and improving skills.

They are also very cool. Had a lot of fun on training, watched tv together at the evening, had a little party together.

Title: Mộc backpacking
Description:
My Ha Giang trip with Mộc backpacking was more like the trip with friends than with a travel agency. Both Bac and Harim from Mộc backpacking were friendly, funny, kind, very professional motorcycle riders and very much flexible and responsive planners with the desire of the customers.

I did 3 nights 4 days motorcycle tour in the mountains of Ha Giang with a friend of mine. We had a very amusing landscape witnessed with great company. I suggest not to miss the Sunday market of Meo Vac. If Bac and Harim could have provided more information about the locality, history, culture and people and also more interactive activities with the local people this trip would have been excellent. Well, Mộc backpacking is an aspiring group with a vision of sustainable natural based tourism in the country so I hope you will improve a lot targeting local as well as foreigner tourists. I wish you for greater success.
Thank you for the wonderful trip.

Title: Aos Diving
Description: После посещения океанариума появилось огромное желание окунуться в эту красоту. И уже на следующий день отправился на экскурсию по островам со сноркелингом. Примерно минут 40- 50 на катере и первая остановка. Скажу прямо- не впечатлило. Минут 20 поплавал, забрался на палубу и не много взгруснул. Снялись с якоря и пошли в следующую бухту. Переход был минут 10. Вновь одеваю ласты и маску и в воду. Сначала несколько раз занырнул практически на якорной стоянке, но видимость не очень и поплыл ближе к берегу. И вот оно!!! Какие краски! А буквально минут через 5 оказался в косяке рыб которые практически не реагировали на мое присутствие. Тихонько шевелю ластами, чуть погружаюсь и оказываюсь в окружении этих красавиц. Это ощущение передать не возможно. На борт поднимался одним из последних. Затем был чудесный обед из морепродуктов приготовленный капитаном. Было около десятка блюд отменных на вкус. Я думал, что это уже финал экскурсии и приналег на блюда основательно, но оказалось, что впереди нас ждет еще одна остановка. И вновь восторг от необычайной красоты от подводного мира. Это было одно из самых запоминающихся впечатлений о прекрасном Нячанге.
Rank_of_province: Số 81 trên 142 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Nha Trang

Title: GERBERA SPA - THAI THERAPY
Address: 28 Vu Tong Phan, An Phu, D2, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 700000 Việt Nam
Description:
他のマッサージにはもういけない、、と思うほど連日通っていました！マッサージ技術も完璧、潔癖症の私でも全然問題ない清潔感、トイレの掃除も行き届いている、スタッフの方々もみーーーんな優しく接客してくれます。電話すれば無料でホテルまで迎えにきてくれるし、帰りは当たり前のように無料でホテルまで送り届けてくれます。
＊技術
技術に関してもう一度言いますが、レベル高いなと感じました。凝ってるなぁ、疲れてるなぁと思うところを集中的にやってくれて技術力がとても高いなと思います。
＊値段
値段は安過ぎない？と思うほど他店と変わらなです。私たちは1時間で肩と頭と背中と足のマッサージをしましたが、このメニューで1人400バーツ。ただ一点、難点？と言えば(街全体だけど)クレジットが使えないのでちゃんとお金を持っていかなければなりません。(日本円持っていればスタッフの人がチェンジしに行ってもくれるみたい)
＊補足
マッサージ以外にもペディキュアやマネキュアもあるようで、今回はできなかったけど次回やってみたいなって思います！(他のメニューも期待できる感じで全体的に安心感あるクオリティの高さ)

Title: Motorbike Dalat
Address: 19/28 Nam Kỳ Khởi Nghĩa Phường 1, Đà Lạt 670000 Việt Nam
Description:
I hired a Honda XR150 but they had a good selection of manual, automatic and semi-automatic bikes. I hired for 2 days to go from Dalat to Nha Trang but had to cut my journey to just one and a half. Despite this, Mr. Phuc, one of the owners, sorted out the return without any issues, and I received a full refund of the deposit.

I paid around $15 a day but the smaller bikes are cheaper (but not as fun!).

The bike was great and I’d definitely recommend the XR150 if you’re wanting to get off the beaten track.

In response to the other review, the actual address is in the alley 2 minutes away from the main road of Nam Khi Khoi Nghia and it might be quite difficult to find without guidance so just call the number that is on the website.

P.S I am just a traveller and I’m in no way affiliated with the company, I just felt giving a one star review without using the service seems harsh.
Rank_of_province: Số 46 trên 66 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Đà Lạt

Title: Ho Chi Minh Scooter Tour
Description:
This was the ONLY and BAD experience we had in Vietnam (we stayed there for 3 weeks, so we had plenty of time to visit and enjoy the country). Anyone show up, no one was picking up the phone, no one called us or contacted us. We paid $30 to live this experience and did not happen. The phone number was disconnected and messenger platform was unattended. Believe me I’m not the kind of person who love writing a review, but this case definitely deserve it.
Don’t waste your time and your money, if you go to Ho Chi Minh choose another tour operator.

Enjoy Vietnam, is spectacular ✌🏼☺️

Title: Pacific Boat Phu Quoc
Description:
Unfortunately my snorkelling trip with Pacific Boat was unable to go ahead because of bad weather. I wanted to review this company, however, because if the trip had been even half as good as the communication, it would have been amazing!

From the time I first enquired, Henry’s communication was outstanding, prompt, clear and respectful. The weather wasn’t great during my three days on Phu Quoc but Henry stayed in touch and was ready to proceed with the trip right up until the last minute

Pacific Boat are clearly a company that put safety and customer experience over profit.

Thank you, Henry, for your kindness and honesty and for the great restaurant recommendation!

Better luck next time I visit! Lisa from NZ 😊

Title: Cho Thuê Xe Máy Văn Chính
Address: 24D Tạ Hiện Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description:
Vừa rồi mình có thuê xe bên chỗ ngày 27.9 tới 1.10 và chiếc thứ 2 từ 28.9 tới 1.10, từ ngày có 1 vài nhận xét hy vọng hữu ích cho những người tới sau:
1. Về xe: Chất lượng ok, mũ nón đầy đủ. có 1cái áo mưa trong cốp xe.

Mình gọi thuê xe lúc chiều ngày 27.9, mình gọi số hotline trên google, gặp 1 chú người Hà Nội, mình có trao đổi là mình sẽ thuê tới ngày 1.10, mình có hỏi ngày 1.10 mình bay sớm (9h sáng) thì 7h sáng mình trả xe được ko? Chú đó nói nếu sáng sớm thì chạy xe tới Nhà trả luôn. Nên mình ok thuê.

Trước ngày trả, 10 PM mình có gọi lại để báo mai mình sẽ ghé sớm. Chú đó có cho mình số DT để gọi 1 con dâu chú đó. Mình gọi con dâu chú đấy thì chị đó nói ko nhận sớm như vậy được vì chị ta phải đưa con đi học vào giờ đó và chị ấy nói với 1 thái độ không cần khách. Chị ấy nói nói là theo như hợp đồng thì giờ nhận xe từ 8h tới 22h. Mình nói là mình có nói trước hơm bữa là mình sẽ trả xe lúc sáng sớm, Bố chồng chị ấy nói l sẽ hỗ trợ mình như vậy. Trong khi chị ấy trả lời "Cứ để xe ở khách sạn, sẽ tới lấy sau, tiền dư sẽ chuyển khoản sau". 1 người trả lời 1 kiểu như vậy thật ko hiểu cách làm việc giữa 2 người.

Mình có gọi lại cho SDT hotline gặp lại cho chú ấy, chú đó có nói "Cháu ghé bên cửa hàng ở phố cổ trả xe giúp, con trai chú sẽ đến đó nhận xe với số tiền tổng cộng là 540k cho 2 xe"

Sáng ngày 1.10 lúc 6h55p mình đã có mặt ở cửa hàng ở bên phố cổ của chú đó. Rồi mình gọi chú đó thì chú đó bảo mình chờ chút để gọi cho thằng con trai chú đó. 5 phút sau thì con trai chú ấy gọi mình và bảo mình đợi khoảng 10 phút sẽ đến nhận lại xe máy và trả lại tiền đặt cọc.
Rank_of_province: Số 688 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: Duc Chi Motorbikes and Bicycles for rent
Description: The 2 owners are simply the sweetest couple in town. Truly. Always with a smile, safe advices, and even a cup of coffee when you fill the rental papers. I've been renting motorbikes there for a few years now, and they are trustworthy and super cheerful. They offer the best prices, reliable bicycles and motorbikes, will provide you with gears, safe helmets, and good advices. They speak good english, and will answer your questions (or tame your fear of the traffic!). The location is very convenient, at the heart of the old quarter (near the famous bia hoi corner). I highly recommend this shop.

Title: Thuê Xe Máy Huế
Address: 24A/11 Lý Thường Kiệt, Huế 530000 Việt Nam
Description:
[VN & ENG review] Xe cũ, chất lượng kém. Tôi thuê xe 1.5 ngày mà xe bị hư 2 lần, phải chờ nhân viên gần 1 tiếng để đem xe ra đổi. Nhân viên tuy có lịch sự, nhưng cách xử lý vấn đề cho khách thì thiếu chuyên nghiệp. Để tránh mất thời gian và đảm bảo an toàn cho bạn khi giao thông, tốt nhất nên tìm thuê xe ở chỗ khác chất lượng hơn.

They rented me old motorbikes with issues. During a 1.5-day rent, my first bike broke down in the middle of the road and they came to replace another one for me, which again broke down the following day and required another replacement. Although the staff was nice and polite, I highly recommend looking elsewhere for better motorbikes for a more pleasant experience and your own safety.

Title: Hanoi Motorcycle
Address: 95 Hàm Tử Quan, Hoàn Kiếm 33 - Ma May - Hoan Kiem - Ha Noi, Hà Nội 10000 Việt Nam
Description:
A guy from this store went to the hostel where I was to show me the motorcycle. He seems to be a nice guy and also give you some informations. But he is a good actor, don't get fooled. Do not make business with them as I did. That's why I'm writing, to alarm you.

I paid 250 USD for a motorcycle that was supposed to be trustable. However, after driving 300k, I had to change the shock absorber (40 USD more). The oil was leaking all the time and the front wheel was off-axis. Really dangerous.

I have never been so scammed in my life. I was supposed to finish my trip in Ho Chi Minh, but the motorbike was falling apart in Da Nang.

So, if I can give you one honest advise, I say: do not buy a motorcycle there. It's not only about money, is about safety.
Rank_of_province: Số 692 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: Asean Travel Smiles
Description:
During our stay in Ho Chi Minh we discovered this small travel agent. We went in as we had a few things we were interested in and found the people here were extremely helpful and polite. One thing we booked was a dinner cruise and to our surprise after we were picked up by taxi the travel agent Mrs Ngoc was there to greet us. Mrs Ngoc escorted us onto the boat, found our table, and took photos for us. Through the evening Mrs Ngoc checked on us and made sure everything was satisfactory.
We also booked bus tickets, private tour to Long Tan, and a show at the Opera House. We were not disappointed.
When we walk by the shop we always get a friendly hello from the staff.
I would not hesitate to recommend them.
Rank_of_province: Số 97 trên 155 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Hội An Travel
Description:
First of all picked up 40 mins late
A lot of waiting until we actually got on the boat to Cham island
We made several stops on the way, with not much to see - more time wasted getting everyone on and off the boat!
Eventually went snorkelling. Coral is all dead and very few fish. A lot of boat trips go here (about 15 in the same area). The overcrowding might have been due to the Da nang fireworks this weekend.
Then told to get out after 40 mins
We went back to a beach for lunch. Again overcrowded due to all the boats going there. But had a good selection of different Vietnamese dishes which were all included in the price

Title: Labixa
Description: К 9.00 приехали к офису в порту. Не говорят по русски. На ломаном английском взяли скуба дайвинг и дайвинг с человеком на спине. Нас было двое и двое китайцев, почти эксклюзивный тур. Привезли на платформу, пытались развести на шкафчик за 250 000 донгов, мы отказались. Под водой показали кораллы, всякую живность. Давали все потрогать, мальчик доставал из под камней всяких гадов морских, показывал, к каким кораллам можно прикоснуться, водил за руку, кормил рыбок и дал покормить мне.. Вообщем понравилось т. к. я в первый раз. После меня в таком же батискафе погружался вьетнамский мальчик лет десяти, тоже остался доволен. Спросила маску и трубку - дали без вопросов об оплаты. Потом перевезли к острову. Там плавали чуть больше часа, мир подводный богаче. Кораллы, рыбы, черви, ежи, звезды - много чего в естественной среде обитания. Море очень чистое и нас в месте второго погружения было всего пятеро, считая капитана на борту. Вернулись - сами предложили помыться пресной водой бесплатно. Спросили про обещанный ланч - пытались развести, что типа не включён. Но я знаю- что он включён, настояли и нам принесли обед - 2 тарелки рис с мясом и зеленью, суп, воду. Попросила чай - принесли. До отъезда оставалось около часа - сами предложили поплавать с масками, чем мы и воспользовались. Лежаками пользовались бесплатно. За 1 300 000 (56 usd по курсу) за двоих и все удовольствие ставлю пятерку. Может нам просто повезло? Не бойтесь четко уточнять что входит в тур и на месте требовать оплаченных услуг. Вьетнамцы тоже хитрые и хотят сшибить лишний донг с «богатого» фаранга. Индивидуальный инструктор на первом погружении, очень понравилась манера объяснения, что смотреть в виде тактильного контакта, для детей думаю, самое то. Ни на первом, ни на втором погружении никто не торопил по времени. Насмотрелись, наплавались, можно ехать дальше, именно, как индивидуальный тур.
Rank_of_province: Số 88 trên 142 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Nha Trang

Title: Danang Backpacker Tourist
Description:
Booked via this company to take myself and bike from Dalat to Nha Trang to avoid to two day journey via bike.

Arrived at the office then Informed to follow a very slow moving car to the actual pick up point outside of town.

The coach arrived and the bike was torn apart and chucked under the bus when I told them to be more careful they became aggressive.

The bus was worn out with a broken toilet that stunk for the whole ten hour journey.

Dumped at the side of the road at 3 am with the bikes somewhat re assembled.

When the sun came up the damage to the bike was clear and it was a real mess. Cracked panels deep scratches bent levers. All caused by the transport of the bikes on the coach.

Asked for compensation for damages to get a crap response stating the hire company won’t care.

Complete con man so had to spend 100 dollars replacing parts before returning the bike.

Do not make the same mistake take the train I beg you !
Rank_of_province: Số 45 trên 88 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Đà Nẵng

Description:

Look around talk a bit then rent ..
Best for all. Tired ..breaks helmets
Again watch online rental
Rank_of_province: Số 102 trên 152 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Sapa

Title: Diamond Bay Golf
Description:
The WORST golfing experience of my life. I'll explain. I played last week (Nov 3, 2022). I went out as a single. I was prepared to wait...no problem. The caddie, however, didn't want to wait. We started out on hole no. 10. No problem. Then, because there was a group in the fairway on no. 11, the caddie drove us back to hole no. 7. I played that. Then there was a group on no. 8, so we drove to no. 13. Played that. Then didn't want to wait on no. 14 so we drove to 16. Just driving all over the course. I teed off on 16, and then a foursome came up behind me. The caddie said that they should play through me because it was their turn?!! A FOURSOME PLAYS THROUGH A SINGLE!!. I'm pissed now. I say skip the hole to the caddie so we drive back to the first tee. It was wide open but as I am about to tee off a FIVESOME comes up and the caddie says that they should play through because its THEIR turn. A FIVESOME PLAYS THROUGH A SINGLE.
At this point I have been driving around the whole course for 1.5 hours and played four holes!!

I quit! I went back to the clubhouse and complained about the insanity. They didn't quite get it. I told them I was quitting. Instead of doing the right thing they insisted that I still pay for 9-hole rate. Horrible.

The course itself was mediocre. It was probably nice at some point but poorly maintained. Lots of water around the course but it was more like grey toxic sludge.

Overall, a horrible experience. There are other courses around the area. Vinpearl and KN are both nicer and professionaly run.

Stay away from this place!!
Rank_of_province: Số 119 trên 196 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Nha Trang

Title: Sun World Ba Na Hills
Description:
Starting with the positives, it was a welcome drop in temperature from the rest of our trip. Some of the buildings were great to grab a photo next to.

We went with our daughters aged 7 and 4. The staff at the entrance were keen to charge as much as they could but then once inside our kids had very, very little they could go on. Even the soft play area was restricted for the 4 year old to something more suitable for a 2 year old.

Walking an age between pretty looking buildings which were as devoid of content as the park was of soul.

I managed to go on the 4D experience whilst my wife went on the (baby)soft play with the kids as she'd gone on something aimed at the over 130cm and like much of ba na hills it was underwhelming.

It's got the foundations of a great attraction but needs to up its game in terms of content.
Rank_of_province: Số 20 trên 43 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Searama Dive Center
Description: Ik ben samen met mijn vrouw gaan snorkelen in het noorden. Er was nog een frans stel aanwezig. De boot is wat verouderd maar prima te doen als je dit een beetje ziet als vietnamese charme. Het personeel aan boord is vriendelijk en spreekt een klein beetje engels. De gene bij wie je boekt spreekt uitstekend engels. De boot is goedkoop in vergelijking met andere tours. Het eten is uitstekend. Het snorkelen bij turle island is zeer mooi.

Title: Indochina Explorer Tours
Description:
I have just completed a 13 day motorcycle tour of Vietnam conducted by Explore Indochina who are based in Hanoi. We were provided with 650cc Russian Ural motorcycles which proved to be a great bike with low down torque. There were 5 customers in the group plus our tour guide, Glen, and our mechanic, Diep. We were all riding Ural motorbikes.

It was a well planned tour with fantastic scenery, good to excellent accommodation and of course plenty of excellent food. Nothing was a problem for the Company's staff and we were treated very well indeed.

I can recommend this company to anybody who is considering a motorbike tour of Vietnam.

Title: Du Lịch Khám Phá Việt
Description: Worst agency ever. They lie to you about tour agenda, and change drivers and location throughout the tour. Complaints the most don't take. They charged us 800k vnd for taxi to a village festival only about 8km away from Sa Pa, and did not go to the other 2 promised destinations. Total rip off don't go there. You have been warned!
Rank_of_province: Số 104 trên 152 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Sapa

Title: Area11DiverPQ Diving Center
Description:
I booked 6 dives in advance. One day before I showed up to discuss the details and pay. The next day it turned out that the plan changed and they left earlier without me. I was informed about it by email, which I hadn’t checked that day so I didn’t know about that. If I were the organiser I would rather expect a response. And since they didn’t get it, they should assume that I was not informed and not change the plan. I wasted my day, because it was too late to organise anything elsewhere. I ended up only with 5 dives on the next two days (I decided to book one more to make up for the lost day).
Dives were rather okay, but no one bothered to ask the divers to try e.g. the fins or wetsuits to check if they suit well. On the second day I ended up with different fins which were either too big (no one likes to swim in too big fins which are falling from your feet all the time) or small. We were already on the boat so it was not possible to replace them. On the first day I asked if I can leave my wetsuit with them and if they could bring it on the second day - they said no problem. Obviously that was my mistake because they forgot about it on the second day.
During the dives the dive guide was swimming rather fast so sometimes I felt like I have to hurry after him instead of admiring the reef.
Oh, and by the way no one returned me my wetsuit or even wrote an email after to check if I want it back. Also a surprising thing was that I paid more for an additional dive that my partner.
All in all, people were rather nice but organisation was so poor that I definitely would not recommend this dive centre.
Rank_of_province: Số 17 trên 27 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Dương Đông

Title: Hieu Motorbike and Jeep Tours
Description: Wir haben die Sanddunes Tour vom Hostel aus gebucht. Am Hostel wurden wir mit einem sehr alten Jeep abgeholt und mussten uns zu acht da irgendwie rein quetschen. Nach dem Fairy Stream wurden wir zu den White Sanddunes gefahren. Dort wurde uns gesagt, wir sind spät dran und wenn wir den Sonnenuntergang noch sehen möchten, müssen wir mit einem Quad dorthin fahren. Wir mussten 200.000 Dong pro Person dafür bezahlen, dass man uns da hin fährt. Wenn wir alleine mit dem Quad hätten fahren wollen, hätten wir 800.000 Dong hinblättern müssen. Die Quadfahrt hat mehr gekostet als die Tour insgesamt. Am nächsten haben sich Hostelgäste beschwert, die die Tour für morgens gebucht hatten um den Sonnenaufgang zu sehen. Denen wurde auch erzählt sie wären zu spät dran. Vielleicht ist das die Masche um den Touristen Geld aus den Rippen zu leihern. Besagte Gäste die sich beschwert hatten, wurden am selben Tag dem Hostel verwiesen.

Title: Saigontourist Travel - Day Tours
Description: Cơ quan tôi đang đi tham quan tại Laguna, Lăng Cô, TT Huế. Khu nghỉ dưỡng rất đẹp. Đoàn chúng tôi ở tại khu căn hộ mà theo hướng dẫn viên là VIP, phòng tôi ở là LV 5A. Đáng lẽ sẻ rất là vui, Nhưng chuyến đi không như ý vì công ty lữ hành Saigontourist này. Theo cam kết phía công ty thì mỗi cân hộ chỉ tối đa là 4 người cho hai phòng, Nhưng hướng dẫn viên đã bố trí phòng tôi đến 5 người mà không hề nói trước với chúng tôi. Kết quả là có một người phải nằm phòng khách. Việc bố trí thừa người nhưng khăn mặt, khăn tắm và những thứ phục vụ cá nhân vẫn chỉ cho 4 người. 2 phòng nhưng một phòng giường quá bé nên thêm một một người nữa xuống sofa ngủ tiếp. Kết quả là thiếu chăn gối. Lạnh. Rất lạnh. Bực mình. Rất bực mình.

Anh em bạn bè của mình hãy share rộng ra để có ai mà muốn đi Tràng An thì đừng bao giờ mua tour của cty Thesinhtourist Hà Nội

Yes, I'll admit that the islands were overrun by Chinese and Vietnamese tourists... but I'm the type of person who tries to squeeze out the good from the bad. I was able to find places that weren't crowded and it was very peaceful and relaxing. I went scuba diving as well and it was beautiful! A lot of live coral and lots and lots of fish! 👍🏽 Unfortunately I can't post my diving pics just yet bcoz they were uploaded to a CD and I don't have a computer to look at them right now. Anyhow, I had a wonderful experience and all the staff and our tour guide were friendly and helpful.

Title: Hà Thị Kiều Linh
Description:
Note this has nothing to do with the travel agency, but like father like son...

!!CAUTION SCAM!!

DO NOT BUY YOUR BIKES HERE

I'd give him actually 0 stars. He has a shop in town and a garage slightly outside of Hanoi, so we thought of him as a good man.
Not knowing any better, we bought three bikes off of him, two of said bikes apparently STOLEN or with stolen parts.

We drove from Hanoi to Ho Chi Minh luckily without getting checked by the Police, because they would have taken the bikes from us. Unlucky for us we checked the numbers from the blue card with the numbers on the chassis and number plates.
The engine number however didn't match and we did not recognize that. He sold us the bikes without any further mentioning of that.

So now in Ho chi Minh we have troubles selling our bikes at any reasonable price and every Mechanik keeps telling us they would only buy them for parts.

Yes we did not check the number. We didn't know. But that's honestly a big inhumane mistreatment and the only thing we can do now, is to make sure you are not getting harmed.

You should go to a vendor with a shop and pay a little more to actually get a good and safe bike, if you want to travel for 3000km through Vietnam.

Linh's Motorbike is not one of them.

Thank you for your time and reading this. Stay safe.
Rank_of_province: Số 706 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: Motorbike Rental
Address: 31 Phúc Tân, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description:
Tony is probably the worst guy when it comes to motorbikes. We agreed about a price and told him that we will pick up the bikes next morning. He came with three different bikes but they looked fine.
After a couple of hours I realized that there was something wrong with the gas and even worse, with the breaks as well. Sometimes my rear brake didn’t work at all, which is probably the most dangerous issue because the front break was pretty weak as well.
So we fixed other things and decided to sell the bikes after three weeks.
He promised me, that he will buy the bikes for a good price (I showed him a screenshot from his advert on travelswop.com)

Before we arrived in Hanoi I text him a couple of times, but he never replied. So I started to annoy him until he said, he will buy them for 60% back. He also sent me a screenshot where it says that he buys the bikes in Hanoi for 65-70%.

When we arrived in Hanoi he suddenly started to play stupid and wanted to tell me, that he thought we were going to HCM (I showed him all the screenshots). Of course he kept playing stupid. After we finally negotiated a price, he gave us the money in cash but got really nervous because other customers were around.
The worst was probably, that he laughed when I told him about the issue with the breaks. They never checked the motorbikes at all.

Please be careful with this guy.
Rank_of_province: Số 709 trên 960 Hoạt động ngoài trời ở Hà Nội

Title: Eco Paradise Dolce Vita

Рыбалка в выкопанном болотце, крокодилы измученные и до вашей кормежки им дела нет. В общем если вы хотите выбросить деньги, то лучше отправьте мне - реквизиты вышлю😅

Title: Trekking Travel - Day Tours
Description:
First off... I have no positive!
We opted for the open bus ticket from Sinhtourist to travel 1 month in Vietman as it would give us the best freedom to see all the sights. We choose Hanoi - Hue - Danang - Hoi an - Nha Trang - Dalat - HCMC.
After being picked up from our hotel and taken to the night bus to Hue we learned that it wasn’t this company but trekking travel that had given us the open ticket vouchers. So basically Sinhtourist sell you off to other companies and you don’t even know! Therefore when everything goes wrong.... which it did, no one will take responsibility and you get stranded in a city... with tickets you can’t use! My advice and please take it.... just book the buses or transfers individually through your hotel or hostel. It doesn’t cost much more and you’ll be covered by them!
Quick overview of our approx 2000km...
Hanoi to hue - on time... ok 12 hour sleeper bus... horrid toilet... a local was sick in there all night, and locals sleeping in all the floor spaces. They stop all the time to drop off packages and collect... I just don’t want to know...
Hue to Danang - 45 mins late... short 2 hours, Standard bus
Danang to Hoi An - after waiting 1.5 hours for this bus, which only take 45 mins to Hoi An, the women yelled at us to help unpack all the stuff they drop off, she snatched our bags and my partners hoodie and threw them on the ground and his hoodie in poo pile puddle... we got a grabcar!
Hoi An to Nha Trang - as the flights were only 30€ each we flew instead of dreading another 12 night bus with random stops and doggie packages being exchanged.
Then in Nha Trang the company didn’t exist! Went to the address in our book... nope. Went to 2 other bus places... no one knew trekking travel. After hours of searching we went back to the original address which is occupied by the Hanh cafe. After like 20 phone calls and another hour the guy gave us our two final journeys through them. He just ripped our book in half and said no good.
Haven’t taken those two buses yet, but wanted to get this review in to warn everyone especially backpackers like myself that’s it’s a big NO!
Rank_of_province: Số 442 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: Ông
Description:
I recently had a ticket with your airline and needed to change the travel date. Following the instructions on your website, I proceeded to make the necessary changes online, for which I was charged $165.

To my dismay, after just an hour, I received an email from your company stating that my request for a date change had been rejected, citing an exorbitant changing fee of $1300. This sudden change in the fee is not only unreasonable but also completely unacceptable. I trusted the price offered by your website and made the necessary arrangements accordingly.

Furthermore, I have had to engage in multiple conversations through your customer service chat, which has proven to be an incredibly frustrating and time-consuming experience. The representatives I interacted with displayed a lack of professionalism and were consistently rude. This kind of behavior is not what I expect from a reputable company, and it has left me feeling extremely dissatisfied.
